original: in a speech in Budapest, [HUN.GetLeader] has demanded that his Austrian subjects be permitted to return to his rule. In a gesture of reconciliation, however, he has publicly noted that the Austrian people should be permitted to make that choice for themselves.
translation: 在布达佩斯的演讲中，[HUN.GetLeader] 已要求他的奥地利臣民回归他的统治。不过，他以和解的姿态公开指出，应该允许奥地利人民自己作出选择。

original: Let the people have their say.
Such things should be left to professionals.
translation: 这样的事情应该留给专业人士来处理。

original: We will ensure the right results.
translation: 我们将确保正确的结果。

original: The results of the Referendum are in, and the preliminary count shows a significant majority for Union with Hungary.
translation: 公投的结果已经公布，初步计票结果显示，与匈牙利联合占绝大多数选票。

original: Despite a well-orchestrated campaign by pro-Hungarian groups and monarchists, preliminary results show a small majority for maintaining the status quo.
translation: 尽管有亲匈牙利团体和君主主义者精心策划的运动，初步结果显示维持现状占微弱多数票。

original: Shortly after midnight, [AUS.GetLeader] announced that the Austrian people had voted for a union with Hungary. A telegram has arrived, formally offering [HUN.GetLeader] the crown of Austria in a first step to revive the double monarchy.
translation: 午夜过后不久，[AUS.GetLeader]宣布奥地利人民投票赞成与匈牙利联合。一封电报已经递来，作为恢复双重君主制的第一步，正式向[HUN.GetLeader] 献上奥地利的王冠。

original: Despite our best efforts, the people of Austria have decided to keep the status quo.
translation: 尽管我们尽了最大努力，奥地利人民还是决定维持现状。

original: We must liberate the country and return it to its rightful ruler.
translation: 我们必须解放这个国家，并把它归还给其合法统治者。

original: Austrian leader [AUS.GetLeader] has publicly declared that the entire country is united in their opposition to the Habsburgs, and that the very idea of a referendum on Austrian independence is utterly absurd.
translation: 奥地利领导人[AUS.GetLeader]已经公开都将团结起来反对哈布斯堡王朝，而关于奥地利独立公投的想法完全是荒谬的。

original: We shall see how united they really are.
translation: 我们将看到他们真正团结的力量。

original: The Hungarian offer of a referendum has put us in a tight spot internationally. We can't be seen to deny the people a choice, but we can't trust them to make the right one. Thankfully, there are ways and means to solve the issue. What result do we want from the referendum?
translation: 匈牙利提出的全民公投让我们在国际上陷入了困境。我们不能被视为否认人民的选择，但我们不能信任他们能做出正确的选择。幸运的是，有一些方法和方法来解决这个问题。我们想从公投中得到什么结果？

original: With the recent, dramatic shifts in the political landscape of the Balkans, the question of our relationship with the new Austro-Hungarian Empire has come up repeatedly. Today, the Hungarian ambassador has handed over an official note, formally requesting that we declare our position towards the Empire. The Habsburgs claim that, as old crown lands, Bohemia and Moravia belong to them. \n\nHowever, [HUN.GetLeader] has indicated that he would accept a compromise solution, with himself nominally head of state of our country, but with very little real power.
translation: 随着最近巴尔干地区政治格局发生巨大变化，我们与新奥匈帝国的关系问题一再浮现。今天，匈牙利大使已经递交了一份官方说明，正式要求我们宣布我们对帝国的立场。哈布斯堡声称，像古老的皇冠那样，波希米亚和摩拉维亚属于他们。\n\n然而，[HUN.GetLeader] 已表示，他会接受一个折衷的解决方案，他本人名义上是我们国家元首，但实际权力却微乎其微。

original: We shall return to the Empire.

translation: 我们将接受这一折衷方案。

original: We will never give up our freedom for safety!
translation: 我们永远不会放弃我们的安全及自由！

original: Following discussion at the highest level that ran late into the night, the [CZE.GetAdjective] government has decided to accept our offer and proclaimed [HUN.GetLeader] the King of Bohemia and Margrave of Moravia. The soldiers of the former Czech Army have sworn an oath to their new King and Emperor, and the civil administration of the realms has been fully integrated.
translation: 经过深夜的最高层的讨论，[CZE.GetAdjective]政府已经决定接受我们的提议，并宣布[HUN.GetLeader] 成为波希米亚国王和摩拉维亚侯爵。前捷克军队的士兵宣誓效忠他们的新国王和皇帝，国家的民政管理已经被完全整合。

original: Another step on the way to reclaim our birthright.
translation: 这是恢复我们与生俱来权利的另一步。
波希米亚同意建立更紧密的关系

original: Treading a careful balance between the republican and the monarchist factions in his government, [CZE.GetLeader] has opted for a compromise solution. [HUN.GetLeader] will be declared King of Bohemia and Moravia, but the [CZE.GetAdjective] constitution will limit his powers to only act with the advice and consent of parliament.
translation: 由于政府中共和派和君主派之间保持着谨慎的平衡，[CZE.GetLeader]已选择了折衷的解决方案。[HUN.GetLeader]将被宣布为波希米亚和摩拉维亚的国王，但[CZE.GetAdjective]宪法将限制他的权力，只在议会的建议和同意下采取行动。

original: [CZE.GetNameDefCap] has refused to entertain any kind of settlement or agreement concerning their future relationship with us. When our ambassador arrived at the foreign office to discuss the official note he had delivered earlier, he was told that there was nothing to talk about, and quickly shown out the door. The [CZE.GetAdjective] ambassador to our government has declared that, while his government wants a peaceful and friendly relationship between our nations, there is no possibility of incorporating [CZE.GetNameDef] into the Austro-Hungarian Empire.
translation: [CZE.GetNameDefCap]已拒绝接受任何关于与我们未来关系的和解或协议。当我们大使抵达外交部讨论早些时候他提交的官方说明时，他被告知没有什么可谈的，很快就被赶出了门外。[CZE.GetAdjective] 驻我国大使已经宣布，虽然其政府希望与我国保持和平友好的关系，但也不可能将[CZE.GetNameDef]纳入奥匈帝国。

original: Following the outbreak of war in Hungary, the question of supporting them has come up repeatedly. Conservative newspapers have clamored for action to help the Hungarians, claiming that the King can not reasonably be expected to sit idle while his own son, now the King of Hungary, is under attack. A letter by an anonymous group of Army officers has been leaked to the press, stating that a large number of soldiers would be willing to go to Hungary to fight, if the government would let them. \n\nThe government has met to discuss a number of options.
translation: 匈牙利战争爆发后，是否支持他们的问题一再出现。保守派报纸呼吁采取行动来帮助匈牙利人，声称国王没理由袖手旁观，而他自己的儿子，现任匈牙利国王，正在遭受攻击。一封匿名军官的信件被泄露给了媒体，他说如果政府允许，大批士兵愿意去匈牙利作战。\n\n政府已经开会讨论了一些选择方案。

original: We can't afford to be drawn into this conflict.
translation: 我们不能卷入这场冲突。

original: Send an observer mission to Hungary. Make it big.
translation: 派一个观察团去匈牙利，扩大局势。
他们的战争就是我们的战争。

original: Despite multiple appeals from both the Swedish king and elements of the Swedish military, the government of Sweden has refused to allow anyone to come to our aid. Even private individuals who wish to travel to Hungary to fight are refused traveling visas, and the government has pushed through legislation making it illegal to sell guns to us.
translation: 尽管瑞典国王和瑞典军方的一些成员多次呼吁，但瑞典政府拒绝允许任何人来援助我们。即使是那些希望以个人名义去匈牙利打仗的人也被拒绝发放旅行签证，其政府已经通过立法，禁止向我们出售枪支。

original: While the Swedish government is officially neutral, it has allowed a surprisingly large number of soldiers and officers to go on extended leaves of absence and even allowed them to take their personal weapons with them. The soldiers have made their way to Hungary and are now ready to join our military.
translation: 虽然瑞典政府正式中立，但它允许大量士兵和军官延长休假时间，甚至允许他们随身携带个人武器。这些士兵们已经前往匈牙利，现在准备加入我军。

original: In a development surprising even experienced diplomats, the Swedish government has announced that they consider our survival to be a core national interest of Sweden. Rumor has it that the Swedish King himself has intervened on our behalf, threatening to abdicate and travel to Hungary in person to offer his service in the army unless the government offered something more than warm words of support.
translation: 一位经验丰富的外交官语出惊人，瑞典政府已宣布，他们认为我们的生存是瑞典的核心国家利益。有传言说，瑞典国王亲自出面干预，并威胁说，除非政府提供更多的援助，否则他将退位及以个人名义亲自前往匈牙利服兵役。

original: Will they get here in time?

Sweden has become embroiled in a bloody conflict. Making a rare appearance before both houses of parliament, the King has noted that he is deeply worried about his old home, and particularly about the fate his father and family should suffer if Sweden was to be defeated. In light of this, the government has decided to meet and discuss what can be done to help Sweden.
translation: 瑞典卷入了一场血腥的冲突。国王罕见地在议会两院前露面，他对自己的老家深感忧虑，尤其担心如果瑞典战败，他的父亲和家人将会遭受怎样的命运。有鉴于此，政府决定召开会议，讨论如何帮助瑞典。

original: We can't be drawn into their conflict.
translation: 我们不能卷入他们的冲突。

original: We stand side by side with the Swedes.
translation: 我们与瑞典人并肩站在一起。

original: Despite a personal appeal by the Hungarian King, parliament has voted to deny any kind of support to Sweden. The opposition has threatened to remove [HUN.GetLeader] through a vote of no-confidence if he should try to do anything that would violate Hungarian neutrality.
translation: 尽管匈牙利国王提出了个人诉求，但议会投票否决了任何对瑞典的援助。如果他想做任何违背匈牙利中立的事情，反对派已经威胁要通过不信任投票来废除[HUN.GetLeader]。

original: Hungary has opened their old arsenals and send us a number of refurbished rifles and other infantry equipments. Several thousand Hungarian volunteers have also made their way to us.
translation: 匈牙利已经开放了他们的旧军械库，并向我们发送了一些翻新的步枪和其他步兵装备。数千名匈牙利志愿军也向我们走来。

original: The Hungarian government has issued a statement proclaiming that any attack on Sweden is to be considered an attack on Hungary as well. The Hungarian Military has been placed at high alert and is expected to enter the war as soon as mobilization is complete.
translation: 匈牙利政府发表声明称，任何对瑞典的攻击都将被视为对匈牙利的攻击。匈牙利军队已处于高度戒备状态，一旦动员完成，预计将立即投入战斗。

original: The Hungarian government has approached us with the offer to renegotiate the Treaty of Trianon. Under their offer, the restrictions on army size in the treaty would be changed to allow Hungary to bring its current army to full strength. Hungary would further be permitted to spend a greater portion of its budget on expanding and modernizing its military industries. \n\nWith a democratic government firmly in charge of the country, there is considerable support for the scheme in our diplomatic service.
translation: 匈牙利政府已向我们提出重新谈判特里亚农条约的提议。根据他们的提议，条约中对军队规模的限制将被修改，以允许匈牙利充分发挥其现有军队的作用。匈牙利还将被允许将其更大部分预算用于扩大和现代化军事工业。\n\n在一个由民主政府牢牢掌控的国家中，我们驻外部门的谋划将获得相当大的支持度。

original: And what would they need a bigger army for?
translation: 他们需要一支规模更大的军队吗？

original: The government of [HUN.GetLeader] has scored a major political victory, as [From.GetNameDef] has just ratified the Revision to the Treaty of Trianon. We are now allowed to reinstate conscription and can openly earmark money for the construction of military factories in the budget.
translation: [HUN.GetLeader]政府已经取得了重大的政治胜利，因为[From.GetNameDef]刚刚批准了修订的特里亚农条约。我们现在可以恢复征兵，并且可以公开拨款用于在预算中的军工厂建设。

original: The government of [From.GetNameDef] has refused to budge on the rearmament issue. Talks have broken down almost immediately, with the [From.GetAdjective] delegation stalling at every opportunity and turning minor issues such as the seating order into hour-long debates. It is clear that they don't intend on letting us rearm, but they want us to be the ones who walk out of the talks.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]政府已拒绝在重整军备问题上让步。谈判几乎要破裂了，随着[From.GetAdjective] 代表在每一个机会上停滞不前，诸如座位顺序等等小问题演变成了长达一小时的辩论。很明显，他们不打算让我们重新武装起来，但他们希望我们成为退出谈判的人。

original: Very well, we shall indulge them.
translation: 很好，我们会迁就他们的意见。

original: Hungary has recently started to feel out its neigbours about revising some of the restrictions placed on it after the last war. Specifically, they want to reintroduce conscription and expand their military industries. The Hungarian argument is that the world is becoming less safe with every passing day, and that they need a proper military to defend themselves. [From.From.GetNameDefCap] thinks otherwise.
translation: 匈牙利最近开始试探其邻国对修改上一场战争后的一些限制的态度。具体来说，他们想重新征兵，并扩大其军事工业。匈牙利的观点是，世界正变得越来越不安全，他们需要一支适当的军队来保卫自己。[From.From.GetNameDefCap]却不这样认为。

original: Hungary should be permitted limited rearmament.
translation: 应该允许匈牙利进行有限的重整军备。

original: We can't upset the balance of power in the region.
translation: 我们不能打破这个地区的力量平衡。

original: The Ambassador from [From.GetNameDef] has made it clear that his government is strongly against our decision to deny the Hungarians the right to rearm. He further made it clear that should we insist on Hungary remaining disarmed, his government will take that into consideration when diplomatic issues concerning us arise in the future. \n\nIn other words, they are willing to gamble our current good relations on it.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]大使已经明确表示，他的政府强烈反对我们拒绝匈牙利人重新武装的权利。他进一步明确表示，如果我们坚持要匈牙利解除武装，那么他们政府在今后涉及我们的外交问题上将考虑到这一点。\n\n换句话说，他们愿意赌上我们目前的良好关系。

original: Let us pray they are not wrong.
translation: 让我们祈祷他们没有错吧。

original: We must be firm on this issue.
translation: 我们必须在这个问题上坚定立场。

original: The government of [From.GetNameDef] has informed us that they consider the question of revising the Treaty of Trianon to be a purely internal matter of the countries concerned, and have refused to get involved in the matter. It appears they care more about keeping good relations with their former allies than in justice.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]政府已经通知我们，他们认为修改特里亚农条约的问题纯粹是有关国家的内部事务，并拒绝卷入此事。看来他们更关心与前盟友保持良好关系而不是维护正义。

original: Despite heavy political pressure from [From.From.GetNameDef], [From.GetNameDef] has categorically refused to discuss the issue. It seems that they are still afraid that we will use our weapons against them. \n\nWith all diplomatic avenues blocked, we will have to wait and see if we will get another opportunity in the future to revisit the issue.
translation: 尽管[From.From.GetNameDef]的政治压力很大，[From.GetNameDef]已断然拒绝讨论这个问题。看来他们仍然担心我们会用我们的武器对付他们。\n\n在所有外交途径受阻的情况下，我们将不得不等待时机，期待今后再次有机会重新讨论这个问题。
我们真的那么具有威胁性吗？

original: [HUN.GetLeader] today publicly stated that he no longer considers [HUN.GetNameDef] bound by the treaty. More than that, he declared it null and void, claiming that it was forced on Hungary at gun point and therefore never legally binding. The Hungarian government has not even bothered to formally inform us of their decision.\n\n Many in the government favor a strong reply. If we show the Hungarians that we are not afraid of them, they will surely fold. However, they might also decide that we are bluffing.
translation: [HUN.GetLeader]今天公开声明，他不再认为[HUN.GetNameDef]受该条约约束。除此之外，他宣称它是无效的，声称它是用武力逼迫匈牙利就范的，因此从来没有法律约束力。匈牙利政府甚至没打算正式将他们的决定通知我们。\n\n 政府中的许多人都赞成采取强硬的答复。如果我们向匈牙利人展示我们并不怕他们，他们肯定会屈服。然而，他们也可能认为我们在虚张声势。

original: We can't afford a war right now.
translation: 我们现在负担不起一场战争。

original: Our recent decision to abandon the Treaty of Trianon has been met with a surprisingly strong rebuttal by [From.GetNameDef]. [From.GetLeader] reportedly demanded that the [From.GetAdjective] military prepare a plan for intervention at once. Meanwhile, the [From.GetAdjective] ambassador has asked that we clarfiy our statements regarding the Treaty, suggesting that the military option is still on the table.
translation: 最近我们放弃特里亚农条约的决定遭到了[From.GetNameDef]异常激烈的反对。[From.GetLeader]据说将要求[From.GetAdjective]军队为即时干涉拟定一份计划。同时，[From.GetAdjective]大使已经要求我们阐明我们对于这个条约的立场，这表明军事行动仍被作为一个选择考虑

original: There appears to have been a misunderstanding.

Despite our strongly worded statements about the Treaty of Trianon, [From.GetNameDef] has not made any moves to stop us. In a recent press conference, [From.GetLeader] did all he could to not answer any questions about our decision to abandon the Treaty. This clearly shows what everyone already suspected: [From.GetNameDef] is nothing but a paper tiger.
translation: 尽管我们强烈关于特里亚农条约的声明措辞强烈，[From.GetNameDef]并未作出任何阻止我们的行动。在最近的新闻发布会上，[From.GetLeader]竭力避免回答任何与我们摈弃条约相关的问题。这清楚地证明了大家都在怀疑的一件事：[From.GetNameDef]不过是个纸老虎

original: It appears that our warning to Hungary has fallen on deaf ears. At a rally in Budapest last evening, the crowds reportedly shouted "Death to [From.From.GetNameDef]!" and [HUN.GetLeader] publicly vowed that any attempt to stop Hungary from reclaiming its rightful place in the world would be met with "a war the likes the world has never seen, a war that will make the great slaughter of 1914 to 1918 look like a mere bar fight".\n\nWe are at a crossroads. We must either go to war to defend our honor and credibility, or accept that we have been outmaneuvered.
translation: 看来我们的警告被匈牙利置若罔闻。昨晚在布达佩斯的一次集会上，人们高呼“[From.From.GetNameDef]！”，而 [HUN.GetLeader]当众起誓说，任何阻止匈牙利重回其应有地位的尝试都将被报以“一次空前绝后，与之相比1914年至1918年大战就像是一次酒馆斗殴一样的大战”\n\n我们正处在命运的十字路口。我们必须投身战斗保卫光荣，否则就只能接受挫败

original: If the Hungarians want war, then we will give it to them.
translation: 如果匈牙利人想要战争，那就让他们得偿所愿

original: With the threat of war on the table, the Hungarian government has suddenly become a lot more friendly. Our ambassador was invited to a private lunch with [HUN.GetLeader], where he was assured that [HUN.GetNameDef] wanted nothing but peace and friendly relations with us. Any statements in the sensationalist press should not be taken as coming from the Hungarian government, which has never wanted a war.
translation: 受到战争威胁，匈牙利政府的态度突然变得友好起来。我们的大使受邀与[HUN.GetLeader]共进午餐，对方称[HUN.GetNameDef]真诚地渴求和平，希望同我们建立友好关系。任何关于匈牙利政府将获取某些地区的消息均系好事者谣传，匈牙利从未期待一场战争

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has declared a military intervention after Hungary openly renounced the Treaty of Trianon. They have asked us to join them in bringing down Hungary before it can regain its strength.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经决定在匈牙利撕毁特里亚农条约后进行军事干涉。他们邀请我们在匈牙利人崛起前将他们压制住。

original: We must strike before it is too late.
We will not be drawn into this conflict.
translation: 置身事外，不要惹祸上身

original: The traitors and cowards in [From.GetNameDef] have refused to answer our call to arms! Instead of standing up to the bully in Budapest, they have rolled over and left us to face the Hungarians alone.
translation: 背叛！[From.GetNameDef]的懦夫拒绝响应我们的号召！他们惧怕布达佩斯的暴徒，我们不得不独自面对匈牙利人

original: We can do it on our own.

translation: 匈牙利索要特兰西瓦尼亚

original: Transylvania was long a part of Hungary, before its people freely decided to join us after the Great War. Unfortunately, Hungary never got over the loss of their territory. At various times, they have publicly claimed Transylvania as an integral part of Hungary. With the recent shifts in the political situation, they have once again decided to advance their claims, demanding that we turn over the whole of Transylvania to them...or else.
translation: 在大战结束、特兰西瓦尼亚人民在自由地决定加入我们之前，这片地区曾是匈牙利的一部分。不幸的是，匈牙利从未放弃夺回它。在各种场合，他们都公开宣称对该地区的主权。随着最近的政局变化，他们再一次决定提出他们的要求，我们交出特兰瓦西尼亚或是……

original: It's not worth the bloodshed of another war.

translation: 罗马尼亚移交特兰西瓦尼亚

original: Rather than face the might of our armies, the cowardly Romanians have decided to return our rightful territories. The entirety of Transylvania has been given over to our administration, and our forces have taken full control.
translation: 懦弱的罗马尼亚人已经决定归还我们的合法领土而非负隅顽抗。特兰西瓦尼亚已经完璧归赵，我们重新掌控了该地区

original: Romania refuses to give up Transylvania
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝放弃特兰西瓦尼亚

original: It is perhaps most telling that the Romanian ambassador, in a meeting with [HUN.GetLeader] this morning, felt the need to add "as always" to his flat refusal to even discuss the possibility of transfering the contested territories. Time and again, the Romanian government has publicly refused our claims, even ridiculing them. For years, we were too weak to push back.\n\nNot anymore.
translation: 据说罗马尼亚大使在与[HUN.GetLeader]今天的早会中斩钉截铁地否决了和平移交特兰西瓦尼亚争议地区的可能性。罗马尼亚政府屡次公开否认我们宣称的合理性，甚至加以嘲讽。过去多年以来，我们太过弱小而不能采取强硬措施。\n\n不过，今非昔比

original: Anger is a poor guide in war. We will bide our time.
translation: 愤怒无济于事，我们将伺机而动

original: They went too far this time.

Hungary has placed its forces in a state of heightened readiness. Hungarian recon planes have penetrated our airspace dozens of times in the last few hours. Our own intelligence service reports large troop movements towards the borders and air raid sirens howling in Budapest. It appears that the Hungarians are serious this time. We might be going to war.
translation: 在高度戒备状态下，匈牙利已经部署好了它的武装力量。在过去的几个小时里，匈牙利人的侦察机数次侵入我们的领空。我们的情报部门报告，有一场规模巨大、可能有入侵意图的军事行动正在计划，布达佩斯的防空警报整日轰鸣。显然，匈牙利人这次是认真的。我们也许将走向战争

original: We made our gesture. No one wants a war.
Perhaps it is time to compromise.

In response to our military preparations, [ROM.GetLeader] has signed General Order No. 1, putting the Romanian military on highest alert. The Romanian Air Force has occupied its war stations, and their fighters have engaged ours in mock dogfights. The Romanian ambassador has asked for his passport. No shots have been fired yet, but it is only a question of time before this crisis explodes into war. \n\nOur ambassadors in Britain, France and Germany report feverish activity in their respective forign offices, indicating that these nations might take an interest in the brewing crisis. If we wish to solve this by force, we must strike quickly.
translation: 作为对我们军事准备的回敬，[ROM.GetLeader]签署了一号命令，让罗马尼亚军队处于高度戒备中。罗马尼亚空军已经占据了它们的战略要地，它们的士兵也开始与我们爆发小规模冲突。罗马尼亚大使正申请护照以回国。现在还没有人开火，不过这次危机演变为战争已经仅仅是时间问题了。\n\n我们驻英国，法国，德国的大使们报告在他们各自的办公地区都有狂热的活动发生，这暗示着这些国家也许会对这场危机感兴趣。如果我们希望通过武力解决问题，我们得抓紧时间了

original: This is spiraling out of control.

Despite the high tensions, there is still a chance to solve the issue through diplomacy. The other side has approached us through back channels, suggesting that they would not necessarily be against a commission of uninvolved nations to decide the issue. Who should we approach to argue our case?
translation: 尽管形势高度紧张，仍有机会通过外交手段解决问题。对方在通过各种渠道与我们接触，这意味着他们不会反对由第三方国家仲裁这次争议。我们应该求助于哪国调停呢

original: There is no one willing to hear our case...

Despite the harsh rhetoric still coming out of Budapest, Hungarian forces near the border have retreated. Violations of our airspace have ceased. It appears that [HUN.GetLeader] wants to keep this as quiet as possible, and there is consensus in the foreign office that he should be allowed to do so. A gesture of reconciliation is a small price to pay when we have so narrowly avoided a war.
translation: 尽管布达佩斯方面依然措辞严厉，匈牙利人在边境的武装力量却已经撤走了。对我们领空的侵犯业已终止。看来[HUN.GetLeader]希望尽力平息风波，他们的外交部达成了一致意见。既然我们想要避免战争，和解的姿态是可以给出的

original: With the situation in the Balkans quickly moving towards all-out warfare, Hungary has decided to ask for mediation of the Transylvanian dispute. They have approached us to request that we sit on the commission to decide the fate of Transylvania. They clearly believe that we will argue their case in the upcoming conference.
translation: 在巴尔干半岛形势急转直下之际，匈牙利决定寻求调停人仲裁特兰西瓦尼亚归属问题。他们已经决定求助于我们来委员会解决此事。他们显然相信我们将在即将举行的会议上商讨这件事

original: Representing them is not in our interest.

Faced with increasing pressure from Hungary, Romania has asked for an impartial commission to decide the dispute over Transylvania. They have approached us to sound out our willingness to sit on that commission. No doubt they believe that we will defend their claims to the area.
translation: 面对来自匈牙利越来越大的压力，罗马尼亚正需求一个公平公正的委员会以解决特兰西瓦尼亚争端。他们决定向我们求助，希望我们愿意在委员会帮助解决问题。无疑，他们相信我们站在他们一边

original: We have no interest in defending them.

Over the last few days, the tense relations between Hungary and Romania have broken down completely. Hungary has demanded Romania turn over the contested territories of Transylvania to them. Romania has refused. Both sides have now mobilized their forces, and war in the region seems inevitable.\n\nThe Foreign Office believes it to be imperative that we prepare an intervention to defend our interests in the region. there is also a chance that the mere threat of us getting involved will bring the other side to the negotiation table.
translation: 最近几天，匈牙利和罗马尼亚的邦交彻底毁掉了，匈牙利要求罗马尼亚交出争议领土。而罗马尼亚拒绝了他们。现在双方都已经动员起了他们的军队，两国爆发战争已经不可避免。\n\n外交部认为，为了捍卫我国在该地区的利益，准备干预是必要的。也许，仅仅由于我们的军事威胁，双方将重返谈判桌

original: It's just another stupid thing in the Balkans.
translation: 这不过是巴尔干半岛上的一场闹剧
巴尔干危机 - [From.GetNameDef]支持匈牙利

original: The [From.GetAdjective] ambassador has arrived at our Foreign Office this morning, informing us that his government watches the current crisis with grave concern. Our decision to risk war over Transylvania has forced the [From.GetNameAdj] government to consider a military intervention on the side of Hungary.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]大使今晨到达了我国外交部，他通知我们，他的政府对当前危机相当关注。我们冒险为特兰西瓦尼亚一战的决定已经迫使[From.GetNameAdj]考虑进行军事干预

original: We can not hope to stand against them.

translation: 巴尔干危机 - [From.GetNameDef]支持罗马尼亚

original: Our ambassador to [From.GetNameDef] has been called in for consultations. During the meeting, he was informed that [From.GetNameDef] considers the territorial integrity of Romania to be in her national interest. Particularly the oil wells of Ploesti are very important to [From.GetNameDef]. Should Transylvania fall to us, or if we should try and occupy Romania as a whole, the oil supply would be greatly endangered. The [From.GetAdjective] government is evidently unwilling to accept the risk, and has gone so far as to threaten a military intervention on the side of Romania if war were to break out.
translation: 我国驻[From.GetNameDef]大使一直呼吁各方进行磋商。会议期间，他获悉[From.GetNameDef]认为罗马尼亚领土完整符合该国利益。普洛耶什蒂油田对[From.GetNameDef]尤其重要。如果特兰西瓦尼亚在我们手中，或者我们试图占据罗马尼亚全境，他们将遭遇供油危机。[From.GetAdjective]政府显然不愿接受我们的提议，并且威胁如若战争爆发，将会站在我们的对立面

original: This war will be over before they even get here.
translation: 战争会在他们参战前结束

original: Despite our best attempts, we have been unable to secure any backing for our claims. Every nation we turned to has refused us, telling us that we should just accept the fact that Transylvania is part of Romania. \n\nHow does one accept the unacceptable?
translation: 尽管我们已经尽力尝试，我们仍无法为我们的要求得到任何支持，我们求助的每一个国家都告诉我们，我们要接受这不公的事实：特兰西瓦尼亚是罗马尼亚的一部分\n\n我们怎能接受这样无耻的要求？

original: The result of the conference on Transylvania has been a complete catastrophe. For reasons unknown, it has been decided that the entirety of Transylvania will remain with Romania. Although the final treaty has some provisions that are supposed to protect the rights of ethnic Hungarians, there can be no doubt that we have suffered a complete diplomatic rout.
translation: 关于特兰西瓦尼亚会议的结果是一个彻头彻尾的灾难。由于未知的原因，他们决定将特兰西瓦尼亚完整地保留给罗马尼亚。尽管最后的条约中有规定支持匈牙利民族权利的规定，这无疑是我们的一次重大外交失败

original: We have been betrayed by everyone!
We will reclaim our lands, or die in the attempt!

We have tried hard to gain support for our cause, but it appears that few countries these days care to defend the order created by Versailles and Trianon. With bullies like [HUN.GetLeader] around, the only thing that matters is strength.
translation: 我们尽力在这次事件中争取支持，但显然，没有国家在意凡尔赛合约和特里亚农条约构建的国际秩序。在恶霸[HUN.GetLeader]周围，唯一有意义的，是力量

original: It seems as if treaties and customs count for nothing anymore. The conference on Transylvania has ruled that the entirety of the disputed territories should go to Hungary. The entirety of the civil service is still reeling from the shock, but a decision must be made - do we accept this abomination, or do we fight it?
translation: 看起来条约和传统已经什么都不是了。特兰西瓦尼亚的会议决定所有有争议的领土都归匈牙利所有。虽然全国上下都还在为此震惊中，但是必须做出决定了——我们是接受这个耻辱，还是为此而战？

original: Hungary refuses to accept result of mediation
translation: 匈牙利拒绝接受调停结果

original:
When informed of the results of the arbitration on the disputed territories, [HUN.GetLeader] refused to accept them. According to him, anything less than the full restauration of the old borders of Hungary would be considered an insult to every Hungarian alive or dead.

He went even further, saying that the time for negotiations and diplomacy had passed, and that there was only one way that this issue could now be settled. 

The Romanian government has asked where we stand in this dispute, considering that we have agreed to support them previously.
translation:
他们被告知了关于争议领土的划分结果，[HUN.GetLeader]拒绝接受。照他所说，任何与恢复旧匈牙利版图相悖的结果都被认为是对该国全国民众的侮辱

他甚至说，这次外交方面的努力已经失败了，现在仅有一条路可选

罗马尼亚政府问询我们会站在哪一边，他们显然认为我们会支持他们

original: The offer does not extend quite that far.
The Hungarians must be stopped, before they subjugate the entire region.
translation: 匈牙利人必须悬崖勒马，勿谓言之不预也

original: Romania refuses to accept result of mediation
translation: 罗马尼亚拒绝接受调停结果

original: The terms of the treaty negotiated in the recent conference have not been met with acceptance by the Romanian government. [ROM.GetLeader] reportedly did not even read the entire document before tearing it up and declaring that he would rather cut off his own hand than to sign anything this humiliating.\n\nThe Hungarian government has announced that they are perfectly willing to fight for what has been declared rightfully theirs, but they have also asked where we would stand in this conflict.
translation: 近期会谈的结果并未得到罗马尼亚政府的接受，[ROM.GetLeader]还没有读完条约上的款项就撕碎了它，他声称他宁可砍掉自己的手也不要签这样丧权辱国的条约。\n\n匈牙利政府宣布他们愿意为他们宣称的土地战斗，不过他们也问询我们将在冲突中支持哪一方

original: We would be willing to support them.

Negotiations between the Great Powers have broken down completely, as the two nations have been unable to find any common ground. Any attempt at a compromise solution has been derailed by mutually unacceptable demands. the delegations have traveled back to their home countries, leaving the matter unresolved.
translation: 由于两国迟迟无法达成共识，大国之间的谈判已经完全破裂。任何妥协的尝试都因对方提出的不可接受的要求而难以步入正题。代表团已经归国，此事仍悬而未决

original: It will be resolved by fire, blood and steel.

Both sides have approached us to decide who gets Transylvania. The Foreign Office has prepared the following brief:\n\n"It would be inadvisable, in the current situation, to award the entirety of Transylvania to one side. A compromise solution, unpopular but acceptable to both sides, should be preferred to avoid insulting one side to the point of refusing the settlement.
translation: 谈判双方都赞同由我们决定特兰西瓦尼亚的归属问题。外交部已经准备好了以下措辞：\n\n“在现在的情况下，将整个特兰西瓦尼亚交付任何一方都是不可取的。应该采取一个折中的方案，这可能不被两方欢迎但可以被接受，要尽力避免任何一方受到侮辱而拒绝调停”

original: Give all of Transylvania to Hungary.
translation: 交出整个特兰西瓦尼亚地区
交出特兰西瓦尼亚地区北部

original: After long hours spent negotiating, some kind of resolution seems to be close. The bad news is that we will have to give up some territory to Hungary. The northern part of Transylvania would go to them, while we keep the southern parts. It is not what we hoped for, but a realistic assessment of the situation points towards this being the best possible outcome.
translation: 长时间的谈判后，即将有了最终的结果。坏消息是我们割让土地给匈牙利。我们将让出特兰西瓦尼亚的北部地区，不过我们依旧能控制南部地区。虽然我们并不希望这样做，但是现实是这似乎是最好的结果。
勉强算是可以接受的结局

original: We won't give up a single inch of ground!
translation: 我们不会放弃任何一英寸的土地！

original: In the early morning hours, the delegations at the conference have succeeded at hammering out a compromise. Under these terms, we would get Northern Transylvania, while the southern parts of the area will remain with Romania. The Romanian delegation has already agreed to it. The Foreign Office warns that not accepting the proposal would isolate us diplomatically.
translation: 在今天早上，我们参与会议的代表团成功地促成了一项协议。我们将会得到特兰西瓦尼亚的北部地区，而罗马尼亚只能保留南部地区。罗马尼亚的代表团已经接受的协议。不过他们的外交部表示他们不会接受这样的结果，他们将会从外交上孤立我们

original: It's the best we could ask for.
translation: 这是我们能要求的极限了
特兰西瓦尼亚的第一天

original: The diplomatic protocol dispensed with, the delegations from Hungary, Romania and [ROM_mediator.GetNameDef] have settled down to discuss the matter at hand. It has been agreed that, as representatives of the Hungarian side, we are permitted to make the first offer.
translation: 省去了冗复的外交礼节后，匈牙利、罗马尼亚还有[ROM_mediator.GetNameDef]的代表团可以将精力集中在手头的事务上。作为匈牙利方面的代表，我们被允许提出第一项提案。

original: Give all of Transylvania to Hungary.
translation: 将特兰西瓦尼亚的全境交由匈牙利管辖
将特兰西瓦尼亚的北部地区交给匈牙利
罗马尼亚将保留特兰西瓦尼亚
特兰西瓦尼亚会议第二天

original: The Hungarian side has presented us with an offer to solve the looming crisis. Unsurprisingly, they have demanded that the entirety of Transylvania is turned over to Hungary as soon as feasible. We can accept this offer, but it would no doubt upset our Romanian allies. \n\nWe could also make a counter-offer. Our Chief Diplomat strongly suggests the latter. A compromise solution would perhaps be more agreeable to both sides.
translation: 匈牙利方面提出了一个提议，目的为解决即将到来的危机。并不出意料，他们要求尽快将特兰西瓦尼亚地区交还给匈牙利。我们会接受这项提议，但是这无疑会打乱罗马尼亚的联盟。\n\n我们也可以做一些讨价还价。我们的外交官建议选择后者。他认为会议将会给出让双方满意的答案。

original: the Hungarian side has presented us with an offer to solve the looming crisis. In their offer, the northern part of Transylvania would be given to Hungary, the southern parts would remain with Romania. \n\nOur Chief Diplomat believes that this shows that the Hungarian side has gotten cold feet, and that we should push for even better terms.
translation: 匈牙利方面提出了一个提议，目的为解决即将到来的危机。在他们的提议中，特兰西瓦尼亚的北部地区将会划给匈牙利，而南部以及由罗马尼亚控制。\n\n我们的外交官相信匈牙利方面的要求会受到冷遇，我们将会促成会议否决这项提议。

original: The Hungarian side has surprisingly offered concilatory terms. All of Transylvania would remain with Romania, in return for some minor concessions for ethnic minorities. The Romanian representative very strongly urges us to accept this offer, promising that the concessions would be pushed through within days if agreed upon.
translation: 匈牙利方面意外的接受调解。出于对当地少数族裔的让步，特兰西瓦尼亚所有地区将依旧由罗马尼亚保留。罗马尼亚方面的代表强烈呼吁我们接受这项建议，并承诺如果我们接受这项提议，他们将会在数日内落实这项提议。
特兰西瓦尼亚会议第三天

original: having decided to reject the Hungarian offer, it is now up to us to offer different terms.
translation: 我们将拒绝匈牙利方面的提议，现在我们将会提出我们自己的提议。

original: Give all of Transylvania to Hungary.
translation: 将特兰西瓦尼亚地区全境移交匈牙利管辖
将特兰西瓦尼亚北部地区移交匈牙利管辖
罗马尼亚将保留特兰西瓦尼亚地区
特兰西瓦尼亚会议第四天

original: The Romanian side seems to suffer from great anxiety to see the issue finished, as they have rejected our previous, concillatory offer and have instead offered to turn over all of Transylvania to Hungary. Ín private discussion, our delegations could not come up with a reason why they would make such an offer, but it seems genuine. We should take it.
translation: 罗马尼亚方面急切的希望看到问题得到解决，他们拒绝了我们之前的提议，而是选择将特兰西瓦尼亚全境交给匈牙利。在内部会议中，我们的外交官最终也未得出为何罗马尼亚会这么做的原因，但是看起来他们是的提议不似佐为。我们应该选择接受。

original: The Romanians have offered a compromise solution, splitting Transylvania in two. Given the tensions between the two countries, this might be the best possible solution.
translation: 罗马尼亚提出修改意见，特兰西瓦尼亚将会被分成两半，给予两个国家缓冲区，这也是个最可行的解决方案

original: Unsurprisingly, the Romanian side did not budge on the Transylvanian issue. They seem to be fully committed to keeping all of Transylvania in Romania. At this stage in the negotiations, there is very little we can do - we either accept their offer or walk out.
translation: 并不令人惊讶，罗马尼亚方面并未改变态度。他们依旧希望完整的保留特兰西瓦尼亚地区。在这一阶段的谈判中，我们能做的很多好少，除了接受或者不参与讨论

original: The consequences of this failure are on their hands!
translation: 失败的后果是由他们造成的
我们做了我们能做的一切。
匈牙利要求得到南斯洛伐克

original: The Hungarian government has approached us and asked that we hand over southern Slovakia to them, claiming that Hungarians in the area are being mistreated. At the same time, members of a terrorist group called the "Ragged Guard" have been arrested trying to cross the border from Hungary. While these people claim they have nothing to do with the Hungarian government, they were found with equipment carrying official Hungarian markings.\n\nWar is in the air, but we might be able to effect a diplomatic solution if we can secure the backing of a major nation.
translation: 匈牙利政府让我们交出南斯洛伐克，他们声称匈牙利在这一区域的权益没有得到公正的对待。同时一些叫做“Ragged Guard”恐怖组织成员在试图跨越匈牙利边境时被捕。他们虽然被搜查出携带了带有匈牙利官方印记的武器但是他们声称自己并没有在匈牙利做任何违法的事情。\n\n战争已经一触即发，但是我们还是能够通过外交手段解决这些问题，但是我们必须保证一些主要国家的权益。

original: We can't hope to win a war. Give up the territory.
translation: 我们没有赢得战争胜利的希望，放弃这些恐怖分子。

original: [From.GetName] has given up southern Slovakia and retreated its forces past the demarcation line. We are now in full control of the area.
translation: [From.GetName]交还了南斯洛伐克并将军队退回到过去的国境线。我们现在完全控制的这一区域。

original: The ambassador from [CZE.GetName] has come to us with an urgent request for help. Recently, [HUN.GetNameDef] has launched a major destabilization campaign aimed at southern Slovakia. Their goal is clear - they want to create a pretext for an invasion to protect people they consider their citizens. \n\nThe [CZE.GetAdjective] government has asked for our support in the matter.
translation: [CZE.GetName]的大使向我们请求支援.最近，[HUN.GetNameDef]部署了一支强大的军队剑指南斯洛伐克。他们的目的很明显，以保护他们在当地的国民的安全为由制作宣战借口。 \n\n [CZE.GetAdjective] 政府因此请求我们斡旋其中

original: [SLO.GetName] has recently come under heavy pressure from [HUN.GetNameDef] to return areas at its southern borders, which have belonged to Hungary in the past. The Hungarian government has indicated that they are quite willing to fight for it, if it came to that. \n\nWe can ill afford a war breaking out in that region over something so small, and should push for a diplomatic solution.
translation: [SLO.GetName]最近受到了[HUN.GetNameDef]的强大压力，他们被要求归还南部边境，这块区域曾经属于匈牙利。匈牙利政府希望加入战争，如果双方爆发战争的话。\n\n我们不希望加入在那个区域因为这些小事爆发战争，我们应该通过外交方式来解决。

original: [From.GetName] has refused to even discuss our demands, insisting that the territory has always been part of [From.GetName] and will be defended "To the last man, to the last bullet, to the last breath.
translation: [From.GetName]拒绝和我们和谈，他们坚持认为这一地区自古以来属于[From.GetName]的一部分，他们将会战至最后一人，最后一弹，最后一吸。

original: We will have our chance, but it is not now.
translation: 我们将会有机会，但是不是现在。
接下来我们应当满足他们
[From.GetNameDefCap]要求我们慎重考虑南斯洛伐克问题

original: The government of [From.GetNameDef] has notified us that the territorial integrity of Slovakia is not up for discussion. We were further instructed to withdraw any regular or irregular forces we may have in the area, or face the consequences.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]政府告知我们斯洛伐克的领土神圣而不可侵犯，我们应当撤离这一地区所有的正规或非正规的军事力量，否则后果自负

original: So much for the idea of national self-determination.
translation: 我们受够了民族自主了。

original: We will take what is ours.
translation: 我们会拿走属于我们的东西。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] government has declined our request to back us up in the face of blatant Hungarian agression. While they are sympathetic to our cause, they are not willing to risk blood or treasure for its defense.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝支持我们抵抗匈牙利的入侵。虽然他们同情我们的处境，但是他们担心加入战争后会牺牲金钱和国民的生命。

original: We can't win a war with warm words alone.

translation: 接下来我们将独自奋战。
匈牙利要求伏伊伏丁那

original: The Hungarian government has started to apply more pressure on the issue of the Vojvodina, stating that it used to be part of Hungary during the Empire and therefore should be returned. They claim that the unification with Serbia at the end of the Great War was "invalid on account of outside pressure", and that the territory therefore still is legally Hungarian.
translation: 匈牙利政府开始向伏伊伏丁那施加压力，他声称伏伊伏丁过去曾隶属于匈牙利帝国，因此他应该归还给匈牙利。匈牙利还声称在大战末期和塞尔维亚的联盟是无效的，促成联盟的原因仅仅是因为外界的压力，因此这里依旧属于匈牙利的合法领土。

original: This is not a conflict we can win.
translation: 这不是我们能够取胜的战争。

original: We will not support their delusions.
translation: 我们不能支持他们的幻想

original: \n[YUG.GetNameDef] has agreed to cede the Vojvodina to us. Our forces have taken full control.
translation: \n[YUG.GetNameDef] 同意放弃伏伊伏丁那。我们的军队将会接管这一地区。

original: In a tense meeting with [YUG.GetLeader], our delegation was told that the soverignty of the Vojvodina was not up for discussion, and that in any event the [YUG.GetAdjective] government would never bow to such pressure. The people of the Vojvodina had their say in 1919, and they choose to stay with [YUG.GetNameDef]. As far as the [YUG.GetAdjective] government is concerned, that is the end of the matter.
translation: 在和[YUG.GetLeader]的紧张会晤后，我们的大使被告知伏伊伏丁那的主权问题是没有商量的余地的。[YUG.GetAdjective]不会屈服于外界的压力。伏伊伏丁的人民在1919年，选择站在[YUG.GetNameDef]一边。[YUG.GetAdjective]政府认为这是这件麻烦事的结束。
我们会独自完成这件事

original: Hungary suggests a reorder of Yugoslavia
translation: 匈牙利建议重新控制南斯拉夫

original: Meeting in Zurich, representatives of the Hungarian government have sounded us out about joint action against [YUG.GetNameDef]. The [YUG.GetAdjective] government has so far refused Hungarian requests to return territories annexed by [YUG.GetNameDef] at the end of the Great War. Seeing how we, too, have contested territories with [YUG.GetNameDef], we could join forces and issue a strong ultimatum, but it might force us to go to war over it.
translation: 在苏黎世的会议中，匈牙利政府希望我们加入反[YUG.GetNameDef]联盟。[YUG.GetAdjective]政府拒绝匈牙利政府关于归还在上一次世界大战后割让的土地。他们希望我们一起给[YUG.GetNameDef]政府施加压力。我们可以加入联盟并给予[YUG.GetNameDef]强有力的最后通牒，但是这也可能将我们拉入战争的泥潭。

original: They shall have our full support.
translation: 他们将得到我们的全力支持。

original: We will not get involved in this matter.

Negotiations through back channels with [From.GetNameDef] have led to an agreement, in principle, that Yugoslavia should be either dismantled entirely or at least severely reduced in size. 

With our new backers, we can now negotiate with the [YUG.GetAdjective] government from a position of overwhelming strength. We could also opt to solve the issue with force, while the Yugoslavian military is still unprepared.
translation:
和[From.GetNameDef]暗中联系后，我们达成共识，原则上，南斯拉夫将被彻底消灭或至少被削弱。

在我们的新支持者帮助下，我们能在压倒性优势下和[YUG.GetAdjective]谈判。我们也可以在他们的军队组织起来之前以武力解决战斗。
给贝尔格拉德以最后通牒!

original: \nAfter several rounds of negotiations, no agreement has been reached with the [From.GetAdjective] government on the issue of reorganizing Yugoslavia. A note signed by [From.GetLeader] himself states that any outstanding territorial issues would be solved on a bilateral basis, "when the situation calls for it.
translation: \n在数论的协商后，有关南斯拉夫问题的讨论并没有让[From.GetAdjective]政府感到满意。[From.GetLeader]在他签字的声明中表示：任何成功的领土协商都建立在双边的基础上，这次的事件也是一样。

original: Then we will go at it alone!

translation: 来自布达佩斯的最后通牒

original: Instead of defusing the situation, our strong response to the latest Hungarian demands concerning the Vojvodina have apparently led to a pact between Hungary and Germany. In a recent speech, [GER.GetLeader] called Slovenia "one of the old, unredeemed provinces of the Reich" that should be reclaimed as soon as possible. The Hungarian and the German ambassador have both handed over a note to the effect that the Vojvodina and Slovenia are to be transfered to their control at once.
translation: 我们的对匈牙利要求的强烈反应似乎并没有解决问题，而是促成了匈牙利和德国之间的协议。在最近的演讲中，[GER.GetLeader]将斯洛文尼亚称为“一块德意志古老而又未收回的领地”，他们将会尽快的收回失地。匈牙利和德国大使要求我们尽快归还伏伊伏丁那和斯洛文尼亚。

original: Instead of defusing the situation, our strong response to the latest Hungarian demands concerning the Vojvodina have apparently led to a pact between Hungary and Italy. In a recent speech, [ITA.GetLeader] referred to Dalmatia as "the unredeemed far shore of the Adriatic". The Hungarian and the Italian ambassador have both handed over a note to the effect that the Vojvodina and Dalmatia are to be transfered to their control at once.
translation: 我们的对匈牙利要求的强烈反应似乎并没有解决问题，而是促成了匈牙利和意大利之间的协议。在最近的演讲中，[ITA.GetLeader]将伏伊伏丁那称为“一块意大利古老而又未收回的领地”，他们将会尽快的收回失地。匈牙利和意大利大使要求我们尽快归还伏伊伏丁那和斯洛文尼亚。

original: Our refusal to bow to Hungarian demands have not led to a change of heart in Budapest. The angry rhetoric coming out of the Hungarian capital is now matched by equally disturbing statements from Rome and Berlin. Both nations have expressed support for the Hungarian position, while at the same time announcing their own set of demands. The ambassadors from the three countries have appeared together at the Foreign office to formally hand over a note demanding that the Vojvodina, Slovenia and Dalmatia be transfered to their respective claimants.
translation: 我们的拒绝屈服于匈牙利的淫威的做法并没有改变匈牙利的决心。布达佩斯和罗马与柏林沆瀣一气，三国大使在外交部提交了他们的无理请求，要求我们割让伏伊伏丁那、斯洛文尼亚和达尔马提亚。

original: We have no choice but to accept.
translation: 我们没有机会只有接受。

original: We would rather die in battle!

Although they face overwhelming odds, the [YUG.GetAdjective] government have refused to see reason, telling our representatives that if we were to seek a military solution, it would find the [YUG.GetAdjective] military well prepared and ready.
translation: 即使他们胜利的可能性非常渺茫，[YUG.GetAdjective]政府居然告诉我们的代表，当我们部队集结起来后就会发现[YUG.GetAdjective]的军队早已严阵以待。
匈牙利要求获得斯洛伐克

original: The Hungarian government has approached us about the future status of Slovakia. They strongly believe that they should have full control over the fate of Slovakia, seeing how Slovakia used to be part of Hungary during the days of the Empire.\n\nWhile the Hungarian delegation shied away from issuing any explicit threats, our intelligence service reports an unsetlling amount of activity inside the Hungarian military.
translation: 匈牙利政府和我们讨论斯洛伐克的未来。他们坚信由于斯洛伐克曾经归属匈牙利帝国的管辖，他们有权获得斯洛伐克的控制权。\n\n虽然匈牙利大使回避有关武力威胁的问题，我们的智囊团报告他们的军队正在蠢蠢欲动。

original: We will not yield an inch.

Slovakia has returned to our control. The question is now how we should organize it. While many in the government favor outright annexation, calling it the "Return to the historical borders", some others are worried about the effect of trying to integrate so many non-Hungarians into our state. Their prefered option would be to set up a devolved government in Bratislava, with some powers over their internal policies, but closely aligned to us in all other matters.
translation: 斯洛伐克地区回到了我们的统治下。问题是，我们应该怎样处置它。虽然政府中许多人赞成彻底吞并，将其称为“故土新归”，一些人却在担心如此整合后外族人带来的影响。他们的意见是在布拉迪斯拉发建立一个听命于我们的地方政府

original: We will return to our old borders.

translation: 一个傀儡政府也许对我们更有利

original: Negotiations about the transfer of Slovakia have stalled almost immediately. The [From.GetAdjective] delegation has stated their position as essentially being the status quo, with no major changes proposed. Our delegation, of course, restated that we consider Slovakia our territory, illegally seized at the end of the Great War.\n\nNo progress has been made, and the increasing frustration on both sides of the table make it unlikely that any will be made.
translation: 有关斯诺伐克移交的谈判很快陷入僵局。[From.GetAdjective]代表团已经表明了他们维持现状的立场，没有大的让步。我们的代表团则理所应当地重申我们将斯洛伐克视作在大战中被非法夺走的核心领土。\n\n在双方不断的冲突下，这次谈判不太可能有大的进展。

original: Approach Germany about splitting up the country.

The Hungarian government has approach us with an offer to divide [CZE.GetNameDef]. We would get the western parts of the country, while Hungary would get most of Slovakia, with the demarcation line between our countries roughly bisecting the country. \n\nThey have assured us that as long as they get their share in the end, they are willing to let us make the first move.
translation: 匈牙利政府已经向我们提供了一份分割[CZE.GetNameDef]的协议。两国大致这样划定国界：我们将获得其西部领土，而匈牙利将取得斯洛伐克的大部分地区，\n\n他们保证只要最后能分得应得的土地，就愿意让我们先一步行动。

original: We will keep their interests in mind.
translation: 我们将认真考虑他们的利益

original: In a secret telegram, the German government has assured us that our interests will be considered when the fate of [CZE.GetNameDef] is decided. When that will be is still unknown.
translation: 在一份秘电中，德国政府已经保证会在处置[CZE.GetNameDef]时考虑我们的利益。而这一时刻何时到来仍是未知的

original:
On hearing our proposal to split [CZE.GetNameDef], [From.GetLeader] reportedly flew into a rage, calling us "have-beens who have not the slightest clue about the realities of the world." 

Needless to say, our proposal has not been met with acceptance.
translation:
听说我们分割[CZE.GetNameDef]的要求后，[From.GetLeader]勃然大怒，声称这是 "天方夜谭" 。

毋庸多言，我们的要求被拒绝了

original: We will take what is ours.
translation: 我们会拿到我们应得的

original: Despite the written promise of [From.GetLeader], the German government has not honored their commitments to us. In the recent negotiations about the fate of [CZE.GetNameDef], we have played no role except as a tool to pressure others into compliance. It appears that [From.GetLeader] never intended to keep his word.
translation: 尽管[From.GetLeader]写有书面承诺，德国政府却并没有将之兑现。在最近关于[CZE.GetNameDef]命运的谈判中，我们没有一席之地，只作为工具被人利用。显然，[From.GetLeader]从未打算遵守承诺

original: Protest in the strongest possible terms.

Following several weeks of feverish activity in the Hungarian military, [HUN.GetLeader] has issued a proclamation, declaring that the current situation in Slovakia is a grave concern for Hungary, and demanding certain guarantees from us. \n\nAmongst other things, we would have to consult them before we enter any alliances or sign any treaties and would need to accept a military mission to coordinate our military.
translation: 随着匈牙利军队几个星期的狂热活动进行，[HUN.GetLeader]已经发布公告，声明匈牙利十分关注斯洛伐克的当前状况，并要求给出明确保障。\n\n至于其他事务，我们将在我们加入任何联盟或签署任何条约前征得他们的同意，并且接受军事调度

original:
A Hungarian delegation has arrived to discuss the issue of Slovakia. They consider the country to be in their historic sphere of influence, and are greatly concerned by the influence we have on Slovakian policy.

The leader of the delegation went so far as to suggest that Slovakian territory may be used as a springboard to launch an invasion of Hungary.

They suggest that the Hungarian government should be permitted to wield a similar amount of influence on Slovakia as we currently enjoy.
translation:
一个匈牙利代表团已经前来商讨斯洛伐克问题。他们认为这个国家在他们的势力范围内，并深受我们对斯洛伐克人政策的影响。

对方领队甚至认为斯洛伐克可以作为入侵匈牙利的跳板。

他们要求允许匈牙利政府在斯洛伐克境内拥有与我们相同的武装力量
斯洛伐克在我们掌控之中

original: Our Plenipotentiary has taken residence in Bratislava, ensuring that the Slovakian government will closely align their policies with our own.
translation: 我们的全权代表已经在布拉迪斯拉发住下，以确保斯洛伐克政府保持与我们一致的政策

original: Despite our best efforts, the government of Slovakia has refused to accept their subservient role compared to us. We must now consider the possibility of military action to secure our northern border.
translation: 尽管我们已尽最大努力，斯洛伐克政府仍拒绝成为我们的附庸。我们现在必须考虑采取军事行动确保北部边境的安全的可能性

original: We will have it, one way or the other.
translation: 无论如何，斯洛伐克是我们的

original: Hungary wants to put pressure on Romania
translation: 匈牙利希望向罗马尼亚施压

original: [HUN.GetLeader] has arrived in Moscow to discuss the issue of Romania. At the end of the Great War, Romania illegally seized a number of territories, including Bessarabia and Transylvania. Our Hungarian comrades suggest we put pressure on Romania to return those territories to their rightful owners.
translation: [HUN.GetLeader]已经抵达莫斯科以讨论罗马尼亚问题。在大战结束时，罗马尼亚非法攫取了包括比萨拉比亚和特兰西瓦尼亚在内的许多领土。我们的匈牙利同志们建议我们向罗马尼亚施压，将这些领土完璧归赵。
同志们，这是个极好的建议！

original: The governments of [HUN.GetNameDef] and [SOV.GetNameDef] have submitted a joint notice, stating that they consider our annexation of Transylvania and Bessarabia to be illegitimate. As far as they are concerned, these territories are under illegal occupation, and they give us one final opportunity to withdraw from the areas.
translation: [HUN.GetNameDef] 和 [SOV.GetNameDef]的政府已经发布了一份联合公告，声称他们认为我们持有比萨拉比亚和特兰西瓦尼亚是非法的。在他们看来，我们不该拥有这些领土，他们称给了我们最后一次撤出这些地区的机会

original: A communist government might be able to get better results.
translation: 一个共产主义政府也许能谈出更好的结果

original: On his recent trip to Moscow, [HUN.GetLeader] had to endure several gruelling hours of meetings with [SOV.GetLeader], who repeatedly called him an idiot for trying to suggest such an obviously misguided scheme. Apparently, we have not quite understood the role of national territory in the revolutionary struggle yet, and have therefore come to the wrong conclusions about what our strategy should be.
translation: 在最近的莫斯科之行中，[HUN.GetLeader]不得不忍受几个小时与[SOV.GetLeader]会谈的痛苦，对方多次称他是个白痴，因为他试图提出这样一个明显错误的方案。显然，我们还未完全理解国家领土在革命运动中所起的作用，因此，我们的战略方针恐怕是错误的

original: The Romanian government under [ROM.GetLeader] has sent a delegation to Moscow to negotiate the issue of the contested territories. It seems that they believe that they can reach a compromise solution, where they would give up one part of the contested areas to hold onto the other. If we agree, which part should we demand?
translation: [ROM.GetLeader]领导下的罗马尼亚政府已经派出一个代表团到莫斯科谈判争议领土问题。看来，他们相信他们能找到折中之策，他们将放弃部分争议地区而保留另一部分。如果我们同意这个提案，我们该选择哪个地区？

original: Force them to give up Transylvania
Force them to give up Bessarabia
Repeat our first offer more forcefully.

In a surprising move, [ROM.GetLeader] has offered to share power with the Romanian Communist Party, if in return we guaranteed their borders. This might be a good way to grow our influence in the region, without having to risk a war.
translation: 一个惊人的举动，如果我们保证国土边境线不改变，作为回报，[ROM.GetLeader]将选择与罗马尼亚共产党共同执政。者也许是扩大我们在该地区影响力的一个不需流血的好方法

original: The [ROM.GetAdjective] government has refused to negotiate the contested territories. In a private meeting, the Romanian foreign minister went so far as to tell our ambassador that the only way we would ever gain these lands is by sacrificing a million men.
translation: [ROM.GetAdjective] 的政府拒绝就争议领土问题谈判。在一次私下会面中，罗马尼亚外交部长甚至告诉我们的大使，我们获得这些土地的唯一方法是牺牲一百万个匈牙利人

original: Then a million men they shall have.

After a meeting with our delegation, [SOV.GetLeader] has offered us a compromise of sorts. [SOV.GetNameDefCap] has agreed, in principle, that Bessarabia should remain with us, but an "independent border commission" made up by officials from the Soviet Union and Tannu Tuva has come to the conclusion that most of Transylvania should go to Hungary.
translation: 在会见了我们的代表团后，[SOV.GetLeader]给我们提供了一个折中的办法。[SOV.GetNameDefCap]同意，在原则上，比萨拉比亚应属于还我国，但一个由苏联和唐努图瓦组成的“独立边界委员会”已经得出结论，特兰西瓦尼亚应该划归匈牙利

original: After a meeting with our delegation, [SOV.GetLeader] has offered us a compromise of sorts. With the Hungarian delegation notably absent, we were told that the Soviets are willing to drop the transfer of Transylvania if we agree to give them Bessarabia.
translation: 在会见了我们的代表团后，[SOV.GetLeader]给我们提供了一个折中的办法。在匈牙利代表团明显缺席的情况下，我们被告知，如果我们同意交出比萨拉比亚，苏联原意放弃特兰西瓦尼亚

original: During the meeting with our delegation, the Soviet-Hungarian side has reiterated their demands. Unless both Bessarabia and Transylvania are handed over to their respective claimants, they will consider military measures.
translation: 在会见我国代表团期间，苏联、匈牙利方面重申了听命的要求，如不全部割让比萨拉比亚和特兰西瓦尼亚，他们将考虑采取军事行动

original: We will never agree to such terms!

The Soviets have accepted our offer to put the Communists in charge. [SOV.GetLeader] personally assured our delegation that no further territorial claims will be made against us, at least not by the Comintern.
translation: 苏联已经接受了我们提交的让共产党执政的提议。[SOV.GetLeader]亲自向我们保证不再有进一步对我们不利的领土要求了，至少共产国际没有

original: We will hold him to it.

Our strong response to Soviet-Hungarian aggression seems to have born fruit. The 'Pravda' recently ran a main article speaking out against "anti-socialist revisionist claims", making particular note of the issues of the claims on Bessarabia and Transylvania as "imperialist behaviour that the developed socialist nations of the world do not engage in."\n\nHowever, the reaction in Budapest has been very muted in response. It is possible that [HUN.GetLeader] still has designs on our territories.
translation: 我们对苏联、匈牙利的强烈反应似乎起了效果。《真理报》最近刊登了一篇文章反对“反社会主义的修正主义主张”，文章特别指出对比萨拉比亚和特兰西瓦尼亚的宣称是“发达社会主义国家未曾参与的帝国主义行径”\n\n然而，布达佩斯方面却反应冷淡。也许[HUN.GetLeader]仍觊觎我们的领土

original: We should love to see them try.
translation: 我们乐见他们进行尝试
匈牙利提议支持捷克斯洛伐克

original: [HUN.GetLeader] has traveled to Moscow, bearing a proposal to offer a joint guarantee to [CZE.GetNameDef] in return for lifting restrictions on the Communist party and transfer of soverignty of southern Slovakia to Hungary.
translation: [HUN.GetLeader]已经前往莫斯科，建议与[CZE.GetNameDef]签订共同协定：解除对共产党压制、转让南斯洛伐克主权给匈牙利

original: Why should we get involved in imperialist wars?
translation: 我们为何要卷入帝国主义斗争中

original: The ambassadors of [HUN.GetNameDef] and [SOV.GetNameDef] have approached us with a joint offer to guarantee our borders against any enemy aggression. In return, we would have to guarantee the communists seats in government. Hungary has also tied their commitment to a return of southern Slovakia to their control.
translation: [HUN.GetNameDef]和[SOV.GetNameDef]大使已经完成了我们的联合协定以共同防卫敌人的入侵。作为回报，我们必须保证共产党在政府中有一席之地。匈牙利还承诺将归还斯洛伐克南部地区

original: These are the demands we need to defend against!
translation: 他们要求的利益是我们要捍卫的！
捷克斯洛伐克拒绝我们的提议

original: Our offer of a guarantee has not been met with much enthusiasm by the [CZE.GetAdjective]s. The political concessions we asked for have caused an uproar in [CZE.GetNameDef], with several prominent Generals and political figures threatening to resign if the government accepted.\n\nCiting grave concerns that support could reach them in time, the [CZE.GetAdjective] government has official declined our offer.
translation: 我们提供的条件并未引起[CZE.GetAdjective]太大兴趣。我们索要的政治特权让[CZE.GetNameDef]一片哗然，几个有名的将军和政客威胁如果政府接受就宣布辞职。\n\n这引起很大的关注，[CZE.GetAdjective] 支持他们的政府官员拒绝我们的提议

original: Standing before a large map of Europe, [SOV.GetLeader] delivered an hour long lecture to our delegation, repeatedly pointing out shortcomings and flaws in the proposed plan and speaking at length about the exceptional foolishness of our proposal, even accusing us of making common cause with the Imperialists.\n\nOur delegation has returned from Moscow empty-handed, but alive.
translation: 站在一幅巨大的欧洲地图前，[SOV.GetLeader]对我们的代表团发表了长达一个小时的演讲，反复指出我们计划存在的不足和缺陷，着重批判我们建议的愚蠢，甚至指责我们勾结帝国主义势力。\n\n我们的代表团从莫斯科空手而归，好在他们还活着

original: Perhaps this was not the best plan after all.
translation: 也许这个计划并非十全十美

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Foreign Minister has arrived in Berlin to discuss a scheme to divide [CZE.GetNameDef] into two parts. Either party of the proposed treaty would have full control over their part of the territory. Naturally, we would be getting the western parts of Bohemia and Moravia, while they would get Slovakia.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]外长已经到达柏林商讨瓜分[CZE.GetNameDef]的方案。拟定条约的任何一方都将完全控制一部分领土。当然，我们会得到波希米亚和摩拉维亚，而他们将得到斯洛伐克

original: We will not tolerate their meddling in our neighbourhood!
translation: 我们不能容忍他们干涉我们的邻国！

original: The [CZE.GetAdjective] government has reportedly refused the offer of a guarantee, on account of the 'unbearable' concessions asked in return.\n\nHowever, our ambassador to [SOV.GetNameDef] reports that there is heavy activity in the [SOV.GetAdjective] foreign ministery. Rumors in diplomatic circles point towards a possible deal with Germany.
translation: [CZE.GetAdjective]政府声称由于“难缠的”客户要求回报，他们拒绝提供担保。\n\n然而我们驻[SOV.GetNameDef]大使报告，[SOV.GetAdjective]外交部将有一次重要活动。外交界的谣言表明，他们可能与德国达成协议

original: [GER.GetLeader] has signed the secret Treaty of Berlin, in which the German government agrees to split [CZE.GetNameDef] into two spheres of interest and promises to respect any decision made with regards to Slovakia.
translation: [GER.GetLeader]签署的了柏林秘密协定，协定包括同意分割[CZE.GetNameDef]成两份，并许诺采纳所有关于斯洛伐克的意见。

original: This is not the deal we were expecting.
translation: 这不是我们想要的方案。

original: In a meeting with our ambassador, [GER.GetLeader] has made it very clear that his government considers [CZE.GetNameDef] to be fully in their sphere of interest, and that any interference with its borders would be considered a hostile act.
translation: 在于我们的大使会谈中，[GER.GetLeader]非常明确的表示自己政府对[CZE.GetNameDef]有绝对的掌控，任何干预都是与其敌对的行为。

original: The German ambassador has today handed over a note from [GER.GetLeader], demanding the immediate transfer governmental powers to him as the new "Reichsprotektor", pending the arrival of a specifically chosen administrator from Berlin. In the same note, the ambassador demanded that [From.From.GetNameDef] be given similar rights with regards to Slovakia.\n\nShould we refuse, the note promises "swift and decisive military action.
translation: 德国大使递来了[GER.GetLeader]的文件，要求移交政府权力到到他本人并承认其为新的"护国公"，直到新的柏林方面委派官员来。书信中还表示，[From.From.GetNameDef]将会享有与斯洛伐克一样的权力。\n\n如果我们拒绝，他们就要用武力荡平我们。

original: Despite initial successes, it seems that the government of [From.GetLeader] has changed their mind regarding the proposed treaty at the last minute. They have been very quiet about the exact reasons for their decision, but our intelligence service suspects a lack of readiness in their armed forces as the reason.
translation: 虽然初期成功，但是[From.GetLeader]对于条约最后变卦。尽管他们对于原因只字不提，但是我们的情报部门怀疑是他们的部队并没有准备好。

original: Hungary demands the right to rearm

Citing the ever worsening political situation in Europe and the complete failure of the League of Nations to stop this, [HUN.GetLeader] has publically announced that his government will seek to secure the support of neighbouring nations to allow for a revision of the Treaty of Trianon. Without mentioning any territorial claims, [HUN.GetLeader] discussed only the restrictions on the Hungarian military.\n\nA delegation from Hungary has arrived in our capital to secure our formal agreement to Hungarian rearmament.
translation: 由于欧洲的局势恶化及缺乏有效的联盟对局势阻挡，[HUN.GetLeader]对外宣布政府在积极寻求对修改特里亚农条约的支持。[HUN.GetLeader]只对限制军队作一定讨论，并未提及任何领土诉求。\n\n一位来自于匈牙利的特使前来与我们讨论匈牙利要重建军队。

original: They must be allowed to defend themselves.
translation: 应该准许他们保护他们自己。

original: They plunged the world into war once already!
translation: 他们已经引发过一次世界大战了！

original: Without consulting us, the [From.GetAdjective] government has signed a treaty with Hungary, altering or removing the restrictions of the Treaty of Trianon. Hungary is now allowed to rearm freely and develop all manners of military equipment, including tanks and planes.\n\nWhile it has been an open secret that Hungary has been expanding its army, this new agreement will soon bring them to the point where they could be a military threat to us once again.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]没和我们商议就和匈牙利签署条约对特里亚农条约进行修改。匈牙利现在被准许自由组建军队研发陆军装备，坦克和飞机。\n\n现在匈牙利已经公开扩充军队，已经变成我们不小的威胁

original: We must strike before it is too late!

We have managed to secure [From.GetAdjective] support for a partial revision of the Treaty of Trianon. All restrictions on our military have been removed. The international arms inspectors have left the country, and the war ministery has drawn up initial plans for a modest expansion of our armed forces.
translation: 我们争得了[From.GetAdjective]对特里亚农条约修改的支持。我们的军事限制已经被解除。国际军事调查员已经离开，战争部长已经规划好初始扩军方向。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] ambassador has transmitted the following note: \n"The Government of [From.GetNameDef] is watching the recent developments in [HUN.GetNameDef] with grave concern. The Treaty of Trianon has long been a guarantee for peace and stability in the region. While the [From.GetAdjective] government accepts, in principle, that nations should be permitted to choose their own destiny, we must urge the government of [HUN.GetNameDef] in the strongest possible terms to abide by the treaty. The consequences of destabilizing the region any further could very quickly become uncontrollable.
translation: [From.GetAdjective]大使呈上以下书信：\n"[From.GetNameDef]政府对在[HUN.GetNameDef]事态发展强烈关注。特里亚农条约一直以来是地区和平与稳定的保障。当然[From.GetAdjective]政府支持所有国家享有自己看法，但我们仍坚持[HUN.GetNameDef]政府应当遵守履行条约。对于后续让地区动荡的行为将很快使形势失去控制。

original: Negotiations regarding a possible revision to the Treaty of Trianon did not progress much past the initial stage. The government of [From.GetNameDef] has made it clear that they won't move one bit from their position of maintianing the status quo.\n\nWe can either accept this or try to gain support from a third party.
translation: 对于协商修改特里亚农条约并没有任何进展。[From.GetNameDef]政府不对任何修改进行妥协。\n\n我们要么接受现状要么寻求第三方的支持。

original: We must yield to their pressure.
Appeal to a major power for support.

With negotiations in Bled in complete deadlock, we must regain the diplomatic initiative by introducing an outside actor. If we can get a major nation to back us, [From.From.GetLeader] might still be convinced to yield. Who should we approach?
translation: 对于在布莱德会谈的僵持，我们寻求新的场外观众加入来获得外交主动。如果能让一个大国支持我们，[From.From.GetLeader]可能就会认怂。我们应该找谁呢？

original: The Hungarian government is currently attempting to alter the Treaty of Trianon to allow Hungary to begin rebuilding her military. The negotiations in Bled have been stalled for several days now. The Hungarian ambassador has approached our government with a request to exert diplomatic pressure on the other side.\n\nThe Foreign Office cautions that siding with Hungary would no doubt negatively impact relations with her neighbours and shift the balance of power in the area. However, denying the Hungarians might cause them to make an agressive move and abandon diplomacy altogether, which could destabilize the entire region.
translation: 匈牙利政府尝试修改特里亚农条约来准许匈牙利重建军队。 布莱德会谈的僵持陷入了几天的僵持。 匈牙利大使希望我们能够对他们的对手外交施压。\n\n外交官员认为此做法将会伤害我们与其周边国家的关系以及地区平衡。但是如果拒绝的话匈牙利可能采取更极端的行为使地区稳定彻底破坏。

original: Hungary must be permitted to rearm.
Hungary must not be permitted to rearm.

In a personal letter, [From.GetLeader] has urged us to reconsider our stance on the Hungarian Rearmament Issue. In particular, he notes that even if permitted to rearm now, it will take the Hungarians years to raise an army powerful enough to threaten anything in the area. \n\nRemaining firm on this issue will isolate us diplomatically. We must decide if it is worth the added security.
translation: 在一封书信中，[From.GetLeader]让我们重新考虑我们在议题中的立场。他着重指出即使匈牙利被准许重建，匈牙利自己也要花费数年扩军才能达到威胁地区的程度。 \n\n坚持立场将会使我们在外交上孤立。我们是不是应该把这一层也考虑进去。

original: Let us pray that they are right.
We know what is best for us.

After several days of heated negotiations, no progress has been made in Bled, and the delegations have returned to their respective home countries. Even the intervention of [From.From.GetLeader] achieved nothing. \n\nThere is considerable frustration inside the diplomatic service. Many senior diplomats suggest that we rearm anyway, just to show [From.GetLeader] what happens if he refuses to negotiate.
translation: 在数日的激烈争论后，在布莱德的会谈毫无进展，出席者无功而返。[From.From.GetLeader]给与的干预并没有什么作用。 \n\n尽管外交的失利，一些资深议员表示我们继续重组军队，用实力告诉[From.GetLeader]不和我们妥协的结果。

original: We can not risk a war.
Now is the time for deeds, not words!

A recent study of modern air combat has shown a critical weakness in our air force. Our fighters are severely behind developments in other countries. The Air Ministry has initiated a crash program to acquire a modern fighter as soon as feasible. Since domestic development would take an unacceptable amount of time, it has been decided to purchase a license from abroad. An additional budget has been authorized.\n\nExperts differ on what type of plane would be best suited to modernize our fighter wings.
translation: 对于一个现代空军作战的研究表明我们的空军存在重要缺陷。我们的战斗机发展相比其他国家严重落后。空军大臣打算尽早获得现代的战斗机。而国内自主发展的时间太过于漫长，所以打算从海外购买生产许可。一个额外的拨款已经生效。\n\n专家正在比较什么类型的战机最适合我们。

original: The Air Ministry is looking to procure a new light fighter for offensive fighter sweeps and point defense, but the Foreign Office has suggested that political and diplomatic concerns should also play a role in deciding which country to buy from.
translation: 空军部长寻求生产新型轻战机来做攻击战机清扫以及点防御，但是外交官表示军购也要纳入政治和外交方面的考虑。

original: Citing national security, the [From.GetAdjective] government has refused to release a production license. We may have better chances elsewhere, or we can look at upgrading our existing planes as an emergency stopgap.
translation: 由于国家安全性的考虑[From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝了采购要求。我们应该去别处试试，或是改良我们国内的战机。

original: Use experience gained from the competition to improve our own planes.
translation: 用竞标的经验来改善我们自己的飞机。

original: The Air Ministry is looking to procure a new heavy fighter for long range interception and bomber escort, but the Foreign Office has suggested that political and diplomatic concerns should also play a role in deciding which country to buy from.
translation: 空军部长寻求生产新型重战机来做远程拦截以及轰炸机护航，但是外交官表示军购也要纳入政治和外交方面的考虑。

original: Citing national security, the [From.GetAdjective] government has refused to release a production license. We may have better chances elsewhere, or we can look at upgrading our existing planes as an emergency stopgap.
translation: 由于国家安全性的考虑[From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝了采购要求。我们应该去别处试试，或是改良我们国内的战机。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Air Force is currently holding trials for a new light fighter. According to our Air Attaché, our newest model is poised to win. A formal request from the [From.GetAdjective] government is expected shortly. \n\nRepresentatives of the manufacturer are strongly in favor of the sale, but there are national security concerns about selling our most modern equipment to a foreign country. Should we permit the sale to go through?
translation: [From.GetAdjective]空军正在竞标采购新轻型战机。根据竞标推测我们的型号已经稳定胜出。不出意外[From.GetAdjective]政府就会官方提出采购申请。 \n\n制造商代表强烈建议销售，但是也应当考虑对于销售最新型武器会使国家安全受损。我们应当准许销售吗？

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Air Force is currently holding trials for a new heavy fighter. According to our Air Attaché, our newest model is poised to win. A formal request from the [From.GetAdjective] government is expected shortly. \n\nRepresentatives of the manufacturer are strongly in favor of the sale, but there are national security concerns about selling our most modern equipment to a foreign country. Should we permit the sale to go through?
translation: [From.GetAdjective]空军正在竞标采购新重型战机。根据竞标推测我们的型号已经稳定胜出。不出意外[From.GetAdjective]政府就会官方提出采购申请。 \n\n制造商代表强烈建议销售，但是也应当考虑对于销售最新型武器会使国家安全受损。我们应当准许销售吗？

original: Following negotiations with the manufacturer and state officials, we have successfully secured a production license for a new fighter. An example of the plane has already arrived to train mechanics on its maintainance, and a full set of drawings and blueprints is expected shortly. Production can commence at any time.
translation: 在于生产商和政府官员会谈后，我们成功获得一个新战机的生产许可。一台样机已经到达用来训练技师维护，一整套生产蓝图也在路上。已经可以随时开始生产了。

original: A study by the Air Ministery has revealed that our air forces are ill-equipped to support the army. Long range air strikes and close air support have both been identified as key areas in which we are critically deficient. The government has made money available for a crash program to acquire a modern bomber, but we must make a decision on which plane we should procure.
translation: 空军部长的一份研究表明我们现有空军装备缺乏。轰炸机的远程空袭和近地支援必要能力尤为明显。政府已经对获得现代轰炸机进行拨款，但是我们首先应当决定使用哪种类型的飞机。

original: A small bomber for close support.
A larger plane with more range.

The Air Ministry is looking to procure a new light bomber for close support of ground forces, but the Foreign Office has suggested that political and diplomatic concerns should also play a role in deciding which country to buy from.
translation: 空军部长寻求生产新型轻型轰炸机来做近地支援任务，但是外交官员表示军购也要纳入政治和外交方面的考虑。

original: Citing national security, the [From.GetAdjective] government has refused to release a production license. We may have better chances elsewhere, or we can look at upgrading our existing planes as an emergency stopgap.
translation: 由于国家安全性的考虑[From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝了采购要求。我们应该去别处试试，或是改良我们国内的战机。

original: The Air Ministry is looking to procure a new medium bomber for long range interdiction and tactical air strikes, but the Foreign Office has suggested that political and diplomatic concerns should also play a role in deciding which country to buy from.
translation: 空军部长寻求生产新型中型轰炸机来做远程清扫和战术轰炸任务，但是外交官员表示军购也要纳入政治和外交方面的考虑。

original: Citing national security, the [From.GetAdjective] government has refused to release a production license. We may have better chances elsewhere, or we can look at upgrading our existing planes as an emergency stopgap.
translation: 由于国家安全性的考虑[From.GetAdjective]政府拒绝了采购要求。我们应该去别处试试，或是改良我们国内的战机。

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Air Force is currently holding trials for a new light bomber. According to our Air Attaché, our newest model is poised to win. A formal request from the [From.GetAdjective] government is expected shortly. \n\nRepresentatives of the manufacturer are strongly in favor of the sale, but there are national security concerns about selling our most modern equipment to a foreign country. Should we permit the sale to go through?
translation: [From.GetAdjective]空军正在竞标采购新轻型轰炸机。根据竞标推测我们的型号已经稳定胜出。不出意外[From.GetAdjective]政府就会官方提出采购申请。 \n\n制造商代表强烈建议销售，但是也应当考虑对于销售最新型武器会使国家安全受损。我们应当准许销售吗？

original: The [From.GetAdjective] Air Force is currently holding trials for a new medium bomber. According to our Air Attaché, our newest model is poised to win. A formal request from the [From.GetAdjective] government is expected shortly. \n\nRepresentatives of the manufacturer are strongly in favor of the sale, but there are national security concerns about selling our most modern equipment to a foreign country. Should we permit the sale to go through?
translation: [From.GetAdjective]空军正在竞标采购新中型轰炸机。根据竞标推测我们的型号已经稳定胜出。不出意外[From.GetAdjective]政府就会官方提出采购申请。 \n\n制造商代表强烈建议销售，但是也应当考虑对于销售最新型武器会使国家安全受损。我们应当准许销售吗？

original: Following negotiations with the manufacturer and state officials, we have successfully secured a production license for a new bomber. An example of the plane has already arrived to train mechanics on its maintainance, and a full set of drawings and blueprints is expected shortly. Production can commence at any time.
translation: 在于生产商和政府官员会谈后，我们成功获得一个新战机的生产许可。一台样机已经到达用来训练技师维护，一整套生产蓝图也在路上。已经可以随时开始生产了。

original: With its old supporters gone, the Treaty of Trianon is no longer worth the paper it was printed on. No one can now refuse our right to bear arms!
translation: 特里亚农条约已经没有任何支持的国家，如同废纸一样。现在我们能够正大光明的组建军队了！

original: Romania wants to restore the Alliance
translation: 罗马尼亚希望重建联盟

original: The old alliance with Romania has lapsed in recent years. The threat of Germany and Hungary seemed remote. But in the face of a shifting situation, [ROM.GetLeader] has come to Warsaw to discuss a renewal of the Romanian-Polish Alliance. For the time being, this agreement is only defensive in nature, with both sides promising to support one another in case of war.
translation: 近年来，有关罗马尼亚旧的防御协定已经失效。来自德国和匈牙利的威胁似乎还很遥远。但为了应对国际上多变的形势，[ROM.GetLeader]来到华沙并提议重建罗马尼亚-波兰同盟。但这一协议在目前而言是属于防御性的，罗马尼亚和波兰在遭到任何一个外敌入侵时，会互相协助对方。

original: Our delegation to Warsaw has returned with a treaty of assistance signed by [POL.GetLeader]. We are now obliged to defend one another should war break out.
translation: 我们来自华沙的代表团已经带着[POL.GetLeader]签署的互助协约回来了。如果战争爆发，我们必须互相帮助。

original: [From.GetLeader] has refused to meet with our delegation in Warsaw, sending only a terse message that a closer association with Romania 'is not currently in the interest of the [From.GetAdjective] government.'\n\nRequests for further clarification have not been answered.
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝与我们在华沙的代表团会面，且只传达了一个简短的消息，即‘与罗马尼亚的关系更进一步不符合[From.GetAdjective]政府的利益。’\n\n我们要求对方进一步的解释没有得到回复。

original: Originally intended to contain the spread of Communism and block the Red Army from marching into Europe, the idea of the Cordon Sanitaire has recently been revived by [ROM.GetLeader] to keep the diplomatic outcasts of [GER.GetNameDef] and [SOV.GetNameDef] apart.\n\nThe Romanians have sounded us out about joining in a formal alliance with them.
translation: 最初的目的是遏制共产主义的蔓延，阻止红军的脚步踏入欧洲，但现在为了阻止[GER.GetNameDef]和[SOV.GetNameDef]扩张其政治势力与意识形态，隔离线的理念被[ROM.GetLeader]重新启用。\n\n罗马尼亚人已经向我们发出与他们正式结盟的声音。
中立是最好的防御手段。

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] agrees to join the Cordon Sanitaire

the government of [From.GetLeader] has declared its support for the Cordon Sanitaire. A delegation from [From.GetNameDef] has arrived to discuss the specifics of joining our faction and to organize plans of military support in case of war.
translation: [From.GetLeader]政府已经宣布支持隔离线。来自[From.GetNameDef]的代表团已经抵达，并讨论加入我们阵营的各种问题，且起草在战争中互相军事支援的计划。

original: Negotiations with [From.GetNameDef] about joining our faction have broken down. The delegation from [From.GetNameDef] have submitted an extensive list of demands as a prerequisite of joining our faction, including far-reaching commitments of military support.\n\nThe General Staff has refused these demands on the grounds that they are impossible to meet, and the Foreign Office now believes that this was a delibirate move by [From.GetLeader] to turn down our offer without appearing responsible for it.
translation: 有关[From.GetNameDef]加入我们阵营的谈判已经破裂。来自[From.GetNameDef]的代表团提交了一份梗概条约，其中以加入我们阵营为前提，包括其军事支持在内的一大堆支援项目。\n\n总参谋部拒绝这些要求，理由是他们得寸进尺坐地起价。但外交部认为这是[From.GetLeader]的一次深思熟虑的举动，目的是拒绝我们的提议又不用对此付多少责任。

original: For several months now, we have tried to secure an alliance with [ROM.GetNameDef], if only to keep their oil out of enemy hands. Now [ROM.GetLeader] has declared that a formal guarantee of military support in case of a war is a necessary step before his government would even consider joining our faction.
translation: 几个月以来，我们一直识图与[ROM.GetNameDef]结盟，力图让他们的石油不被敌人掌控。现在[ROM.GetLeader]已经宣布加入我们的阵营，但在他们政府加入我们阵营之前，我们必须采取军事行动来保证这一点的顺利进行。

original: That would only spread us even thinner.
translation: 那会使我们变的更加弱小。

original: Speaking before a meeting of the Romanian-[From.GetAdjective] Friendship Association, [From.GetLeader] announced that the current borders of Romania are 'unchangeable and permanent', promising that his government would do everything in its power to defend them should war come.
translation: 在罗马尼亚-[From.GetAdjective]友好协会会议上，[From.GetLeader]宣布:罗马尼亚当前的边界线是‘永不改变’的，并承诺战争爆发时，他的政府将尽一切的力量保卫它。

original: Our recent diplomatic offensive has been met with cold rejection by [From.GetNameDef]. Speaking before parliament, [From.GetLeader] stated that the question of a formal guarantee to Romania 'will be decided if and when it becomes relevant'.
translation: 我们最近的外交攻势遭到了[From.GetNameDef]的冷酷抵制。 在议会发表讲话时，[From.GetLeader]表示：‘对罗马尼亚正式保障的问题将视情况而定’。
罗马尼亚提供军事基地

original: With tensions rising in Europe, [ROM.GetLeader] has come to us with a surprising offer: If we commit to defend Romania from any outside threat, we would be allowed to station troops on Romanian soil. \n\nAs a measure of good will, [ROM.GetLeader] has also relaxed restrictions on the Communist Party.
translation: 随着欧洲局势日益紧张，[ROM.GetLeader]向我们提出了一项奇怪的提议：如果我们承诺保障罗马尼亚免受任何来自外部的威胁，那我们将被允许在罗马尼亚的领土上驻扎军队。\n\n作为一种友好的措施，[ROM.GetLeader]放松了对共产党的限制。

original: [SOV.GetLeader] has personally ordered the Red Army to plan for the defense of Romania in the case of war. A small military mission has arrived to prepare bases and air fields for the imminent arrival of garrison troops.
translation: [SOV.GetLeader]亲自命令红军在战争中实行保卫罗马尼亚的计划。一个小型的军事任务已经实施，为即将到来的守卫军队准备相应的基地与机场。

original: Let us hope we don't come to regret this.
translation: 希望我们不会对此感到后悔。

original: Talks about basing Soviet troops in Romania have ended after just a few hours, with the [SOV.GetAdjective]s declaring that they are not interested in guaranteeing our borders.\n\nQuite a few of our Generals have seized upon the disturbing implication that this might be because they don't like their current shape and seek to change them.
translation: 与苏联军队在罗马尼亚的谈判仅仅在几小时后就结束了，而[SOV.GetAdjective]宣称他们对保障我们边境线不感兴趣，\n\n我们的将军中有不少人明白了其中的暗示，这可能是因为他们不喜欢这种被动局势，想要尽力去改变。

original: Our ambassador to [ROM.GetNameDef] has hurriedly been summoned to the office of [ROM.GetLeader]. Before he could inquire about recent movements of the Romanian military towards our shared border, he was presented with an ultimatum. [BUL.GetNameDefCap], [ROM.GetLeader] insisted, could no longer be permitted to conduct itself without his express consent, and should submit every major policy decision for his approval.\n\nRefusal would be met with force.
translation: 我们的[ROM.GetNameDef]大使被急忙的召到[ROM.GetLeader]办事处。在大使向他们询问罗马尼亚军队最近在共同边界的行动之前，大使收到了最后通牒，[ROM.GetLeader]坚持认为：如果没有他的命令，[BUL.GetNameDefCap]不能擅自行动，且应该提交所有重大决策以供批示。\n\n拒绝将被武力胁迫。

original: We must give in to their demands.
translation: 我们只能同意他们的要求。

original: [BUL.GetNameDefCap] has accepted our requests and now consults us before making any political decisions.\n\nA Special Representative has arrived in Sofia to coordinate with their government.
translation: [BUL.GetNameDefCap]已经接受了我们的要求，他们现在做出任何政治决定之前都要经过我们的同意。\n\n一名特别代表已抵达索菲亚并与其政府进行协调。

original: When presented with a list of our demands, [BUL.GetLeader] reportedly laughed and then tore up the paper, claiming that no Romanian army could ever best a Bulgarian one in combat.
translation: 当我们提出一份要求清单时，据说[BUL.GetLeader]笑着把这张清单撕碎，并声称罗马尼亚的军队没有一支能与保加利亚抗衡。

original: This is not worth the bloodshed.
Let's find out if he is right.
translation: 让我们看看到底谁才是对的。

original: Romania demands changes to the government.
translation: 罗马尼亚要求政府进行重组。

original:
When [ROM.GetLeader] publically demanded that he should be allowed to veto any appointment of the [HUN.GetAdjective] government, simply because it was in the Romanian interest, most people in the diplomatic service considered it simple propaganda meant for a domestic audience. 

It was with some surprise that we received an official note to the same effect a little while later.

The threat of military force if we failed to comply has sent the General Staff into a panic, and the Army High Command has raised grave doubts whether we could hold the Romanians on the border.
translation:
[ROM.GetLeader]公开要求[HUN.GetAdjective]政府的任何行动都得由他同意，这么做仅仅是因为罗马尼亚的利害关系。外交部的多数人认为这是有意针对国内民众的。

令人惊奇的是，我们在之后看到了与要求相符的行动。

如果我们不遵从，武力威胁就会使普通的平民百姓陷入恐慌状态，而军队的高层也严重质疑我们是否能在边界线上稳住罗马尼亚。
我们可以做出一些让步。

original: Better to die free than to live as a slave.
translation: 宁愿自由的死去，也不要像奴隶一样活着。

original: Realizing that military resistance would be both impossible and pointless, the Hungarian government has decided to follow our suggestions and put itself at our disposal, with [HUN.GetLeader] promising to consult with us before any major policy decision.
translation: 在意识到武装抵抗已是毫无意义的时候，匈牙利政府决定同意我们的提议，承诺将其置于我们的支配下，[HUN.GetLeader]在做出任何重大决策之前都得与我们协商。

original: In response to our recent request for some changes in the Hungarian government, [HUN.GetLeader] has offered a Treaty of Friendship and Mutual Assistance, which would compel them to come to our aid in times of war, but also contains a clause in which we would swear not to interfere with Hungarian politics.
