translation: 为了响应我们最近对匈牙利政府的一些要求，[HUN.GetLeader]提出了这份“友好互助条约”，这将使他们在我们处于战争的时候帮助我们，但有一项条款是让我们发誓永不干涉匈牙利内政。

original: That was not what we meant.

Despite of the clear inferiority of his armed forces, [HUN.GetLeader] has refused to see reason and ordered his army to take up defensive positions along our border. For reasons unknown, it appears that a significant part of their army has followed these orders.\n\nIt seems that they want to amke a fight out of it.
translation: 尽管他们的军队明显处于劣势，但[HUN.GetLeader]不管这些，仍命令他的军队在共有边界上布阵防御。出于某种原因，他们军队中有相当一部分人遵守了这条命令。\n\n看样子他们想干一仗。

original: This is not worth the time or effort.
translation: 这不值得去花费时间和精力。
罗马尼亚要求彻底重组

original: With the Romanian army poised at our borders, rumors have been flying around about their purpose. When our ambassador in Bukarest inquired about the issue, he was told bluntly that [ROM.GetLeader] has decided that a united Yugoslavia is no longer in his interest. Instead, our nation is to be split up into a number of client states under direct Romanian control.\n\nAn official ultimatum is expected within the hour.
translation: 随着罗马尼亚军队在我们边境线上结界并蓄势待发，猜疑他们这么做目的何在的谣言已经四起。当我们在布加勒斯特的大使询问这个问题的时候，对方坦然告诉我们，[ROM.GetLeader]已经决定了，他对一个统一的南斯拉夫不感兴趣，也不符合他们的利益。不仅如此，我们的国家将在罗马尼亚的直接控制下分裂成若干个傀儡国。\n\n正式的通牒预计一小时内发出。

original: We can't hope to stand against them.
translation: 我们不能对抵抗他们抱有希望。

original: Mere minutes before the ultimatum to Belgrade ran out, an official communique arrived, stating that the Yugoslavian government had dissolved and transfered its powers to a number of local governments, all of which have declared their loyalty to us.
translation: 在向贝尔格莱德发出正式通牒的前几分钟时，对方发布了一份正式宣告，称南斯拉夫政府已经解散并将其权利移交给一些地方政府，且这些地方政府都表示愿意效忠于我们。

original: The [YUG.GetAdjective] government has let the ultimatum run out without a reply. Recon flights have revealed troop movements on the Yugoslavian side of the border, prompting the General Staff to review the invasion plans. Top military advisors have refused to guarantee that a victory against Yugoslavia would be won quickly.
translation: [YUG.GetAdjective]政府已经让通牒失去了它的意义。空中侦查显示在与南斯拉夫的边境线上有军队活动，这使得总参谋部不得不重新审查入侵计划。军队高层也对是否能迅速赢得对南斯拉夫作战的胜利保持怀疑态度。

original: A crisis has arisen between Romania and Yugoslavia, which may produce an opportunity for us. [YUG.GetLeader] has refused the demands of [ROM.GetLeader] to surrender his country. In return, [ROM.GetLeader] has approached us with a deal to split Yugoslavia. He has offered us Slovenia and the creation of an Independent Croatian State under our control.
translation: 罗马尼亚与南斯拉夫之间出现了危机，这就给我们制造了机会。[YUG.GetLeader]拒绝了[ROM.GetLeader]要南斯拉夫向罗马尼亚投降的要求。作为契机，[ROM.GetLeader]与我们达成了一项关于分裂南斯拉夫的协定，承诺事后将给予斯洛文尼亚，并建立一个由我们控制的克罗地亚国家。

original: Why would we need their help?
translation: 我们为什么需要他们的帮助？

original: A crisis has arisen between Romania and Yugoslavia, which may produce an opportunity for us. [YUG.GetLeader] has refused the demands of [ROM.GetLeader] to surrender his country. In return, [ROM.GetLeader] has approached us with a deal to split Yugoslavia. He has offered us Dalmatia and the creation of a puppet state in Montenegro under our control.
translation: 一场危机已经在罗马尼亚和南斯拉夫之间爆发，这也许能给我们带来机会。[YUG.GetLeader]已经拒绝了[ROM.GetLeader]向他们国家投降的要求。作为回应，[ROM.GetLeader]联络我们提出肢解南斯拉夫的交易。他们许诺给我们达尔马提亚并将黑山作为傀儡国置于我们控制之下。

original: [From.GetLeader] has signaled his acceptance of the terms. The [From.GetAdjective] Government will support our actions in Yugoslavia.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经签署接受了这些条款。[From.GetAdjective]政府将会支持我们在南斯拉夫的行动。

original: While not directly warning us away from intervening in Yugoslavia, the government of [From.GetNameDef] have refused to sanction our proposal. \n\nPerhaps they expect us to fail and aim to take Yugoslavia for themselves, without us in the picture.
translation: 虽然没有直接警告我们不要干涉南斯拉夫，但[From.GetNameDef]政府拒绝了我们的提案。\n\n也许他们寄希望于我们失败并自己独吞南斯拉夫。

original: We will be sorry to disappoint them.
translation: 我们将很抱歉让他们失望
对南斯拉夫的最后通牒

original: Having secured additional diplomatic support, it is time to inform the Yugoslavians that the situation has changed dramatically. Spread thin trying to defend long borders, their military situation is even more hopeless.
translation: 鉴于已经取得额外的外交支持，是时候让南斯拉夫知道局势已经极大地改变了。而他们将微薄的力量投入到防御漫长的边境，他们在军事上的情势更加无望。

original: Our attempts to reach out to Germany and Italy for support have not been met with success. The breathing space this has provided to the Yugoslavians will no doubt have an impact on the coming campaign, but the General Staff is still cautiously optimistic that we will be able to quickly secure victory.
translation: 我们联络德国和意大利尝试获取支持的行动并没有成功。这给南斯拉夫带来一丝喘息之机而且无疑会影响即将到来的选举。但总司令部依然保有谨慎的乐观并相信我们将很快确保胜利。

original: A second ultimatum has been delivered. This time, the demands were flanked by a similar note from the ambassador of [GER.GetNameDef], who declared his support for the Romanian scheme, and insisted that our Army would not interfere with the occupation of Slovenia and Croatia by German troops.
translation: 第二份最后通牒已经发出了。这一次，这份声明附带了一份来自[GER.GetNameDef]大使的措辞相似的备注，宣布他们将支持罗马尼亚的计划，同时坚持我们的军队不能干涉德国部队对斯洛文尼亚和克罗地亚的占领。

original: A second ultimatum has been delivered. This time, the demands were flanked by a similar note from the ambassador of [ITA.GetNameDef], who declared his support for the Romanian scheme, and insisted that our Army would not interfere with the occupation of Dalmatia and Montenegro by Italian troops.
translation: 第二份最后通牒已经发出了。这一次，这份声明附带了一份来自[ITA.GetNameDef]大使的措辞相似的备注，宣布他们将支持罗马尼亚的计划，同时坚持我们的军队不能干涉意大利部队对达尔马提亚和黑山的占领。

original: A second ultimatum has been delivered. This time, the demands were flanked by a similar note from the ambassadors of [GER.GetNameDef] and [ITA.GetNameDef], who declared their support for the Romanian scheme, and insisted that our Army would not interfere with the occupation, in order to avoid unnecessary bloodshed.
translation: 第二份最后通牒已经发出了。这一次，这份声明附带了一份来自[GER.GetNameDef]和[ITA.GetNameDef]大使的措辞相似的备注，宣布他们将支持罗马尼亚的计划，同时坚持我们的部队不能干涉相关占领行动，以避免不必要的流血。

original: We will fight to the last breath!
translation: 我们将战斗至最后一息！

original: The Yugoslavian government has accepted defeat. The forces of the allied powers have taken control of the country and occupied their designated zones.
translation: 南斯拉夫政府已经接受了失败的命运。同盟的部队已经接管了这个国家并占领了他们所指定的地区。

original: The Yugoslavian Army has occupied positions along our border and the Yugoslavian Air Force has occupied its war stations. They appear ready to fight. \n\nHowever, a source in the Yugoslavian War Ministery claims that this is merely an gesture of defiance, as [YUG.GetLeader] firmly believes that we are bluffing and that there will be no war.
translation: 南斯拉夫的部队已经部署到边境而南斯拉夫的空军力量也已进入战斗位置。他们表现出将要战斗。 \n\n然而，来自南斯拉夫战争部的情报源宣称这几乎只是姿态上做出防御，因为[YUG.GetLeader]坚信我们只是在吓唬人而并不会真正有战争。

original: Magda Lupescu, mistress of King Carol II, has reportedly purchased a new villa in an expensive suburb of Bucharest. How she could afford it was subject of extensive speculation. New evidence in foreign newspapers strongly suggests that the King himself authorized the purchase with government money.\n\nThe scandal is spreading, and we must make a public announcement on the matter as soon as possible.
translation: 玛格达·卢佩斯库，国王卡罗尔二世的情妇，被曝光在布加勒斯特的昂贵地段买了一个新的庄园。她如何负担得起这项开支引发了广泛的猜测。外国报纸曝光的新证据强烈显示这是国王他自己授权使用政府资金购买这座庄园的。\n\n丑闻正在迅速传播，而我们必须尽快就此事做出一个官方声明。

original: The government has purchased the building and allowed Miss Lupescu residence.
translation: 是政府买下这个建筑并允许卢佩斯库女士居住的

original: The King took the money out of an advance on his allowance.
translation: 是国王预支他的津贴来支付的

original: A new book by a renowned social scientist has recently been released, detailing the extensive influence the King's inner circle has on policy decisions. Most of those decisions end up benefiting the members afterwards. Of particular interest are the dealings of the King's Mistress, who has reportedly used her connections to enrich herself. The King has ordered the author arrested.\n\nLiberal newspapers and the far right are in an uproar over this, albeit for very different reasons. We need to make a statement on this before things get out of hand.
translation: 一个著名的社会科学家最近出版了一本新书，详细揭露了国王的私人圈子对政治决策的广泛影响。而大部分决策都是为了使这些圈子成员获益。尤其有意思的是国王情妇的暗中交易，她被曝光利用她自己的关系来谋取财富。国王已经下令逮捕作者。\n\n自由派报纸和极右翼都在声讨这件事，尽管出于相当不同的理由。我们需要在事情脱离控制之前做出一项声明。
自由派犯下冒犯皇室的罪行

original: The author will be released at once.

Despite being vetted by the King himself, the official coverage of the recent feast at the Royal palace has caused great public dissent. Pictures of the King's mistress in an expensive French evening gown and detailed descriptions of the 7 course meal eaten from golden plates have further inflammed the population, who are still suffering from the after-effects of the Great Depression.\n\nThe King demands that we make a public statement of support at once.
translation: 尽管国王自己审查了一遍，但对最近在皇宫举办的宴会的官方报道还是引起了巨大的公众争议。国王的情妇穿着昂贵的法式晚礼服的照片以及对装在金盘子里的7道菜的详细报道还是进一步激怒了公众，这些人还在经受着大萧条的余波带来的苦难。\n\n国王要求我们立即做出一个支持他的官方声明。

original: The King must be allowed to be representative.
translation: 国王必须被允许能够代表国家形象

original: The King's private matters are not a government concern.
translation: 国王的私事不是政府事务
国王的情妇在巴黎被目击

original: French newspapers have been full of the exploits of Magda Lupescu in Paris, where she has reportedly been indulging in an extensive shopping spree.\n\nWhile this is not unusual in itself, reports that she enlisted help from the Romanian embassy to move her purchases and told stores to send the bill to the Romanian government have been picked up by the national press. We have been asked to comment on these reports.
translation: 法国的报纸最近满是玛格达·卢佩斯库在巴黎的新闻，她在那里被报导进行着一场大型的购物行动。\n\n虽然这事情并不罕见，但报导中说她找罗马尼亚大使馆来帮忙搬她买的东西并告诉商店将账单送至罗马尼亚政府，这点被国内的报纸给摘录了下来。我们被要求就此报导做出评论。

original: Miss Lupuscus acted at the request of the King.
translation: 卢佩斯库女士是在国王的要求下行事

original: The government does not comment on the actions of private citizens.
translation: 政府不对公民私人的行为做出评论

original: Accompanied by his mistress and most of his inner circle, King Carol II has arrived in Nice on a holiday. Taking residence in the Royal Lounge of the Hotel Negresco, the King told local reporters that he intends to spend the next few weeks enjoying the finest food and hospitality, with visits planned to the Nice Opera and short trips to Paris for shopping.\n\nThe local press has been asking pointed questions about the timing of this visit, as well as where the money to pay for it is supposed to come from.
translation: 由他的情妇和大部分他私人圈子里的人陪伴着，国王卡罗尔二世来到尼斯度假。他们下榻在内格雷斯科酒店的皇家套房内，国王告诉当地记者他们计划花费接下来几周时间享受精致的食物和居住环境，并计划参访尼斯大剧院和到巴黎进行一个短程的购物旅行。\n\n当地的报社一直在质疑他们到来的时机，还有他们哪来的钱来支付接下来的开销。

original: It was an official state visit.
translation: 这是一次官方国事访问

original: The King goes to Nice on holiday every year.
translation: 国王每年都去尼斯度假

original: Following rumors of corruption in the Army's procurement processes, the King has promised an impartial investigation into the matter. A preliminary report has been leaked to the press, confirming not only the rumors but directly implicating the King's closest advisors in the matter.\n\nThe entire affair has become an embarassement to the government. The King demands action, but has declared his full support for the advisers in question.
translation: 在关于军队采购腐败的流言传开之后，国王承诺就此事进行一次彻底的调查。但一个初步报告却被泄露给了媒体，不仅仅证实了这个传言是真的，而且国王最亲密的顾问也牵涉此事。\n\n这整个事件已经成了一个政府丑闻。国王要求采取行动，但他也已经宣布对涉事顾问的全面支持。
一个被签署的合同是难以否认的

original: [ROM.GetLeader] has approached us with an offer to deal with [CZE.GetNameDef]. Noting our common interests in the area, he suggests that the country be split three ways: We would gain the western parts, Romania would control Slovakia and Hungary would be granted a tiny sliver of territory in the southern border.
translation: [ROM.GetLeader]已经联络我们并提出一笔关于[CZE.GetNameDef]的交易。在明确我们对该地区的利益所在后，他建议把这个国家分为三份：我们获得西部的部分，罗马尼亚获得斯洛伐克，而匈牙利可以在南部边境取得小小一杯羹。

original: Why negotiate for what we can take ourselves?
translation: 为什么要就我们自己都能做到的事情来协商？

original: The German government has approved our draft of the treaty and the proposed demarcation lines. All that remains is to send an ultimatum to Prague.
translation: 德国政府已经批准了我们的条约草案和划界线倡议。我们所需要做的只剩下给布拉格发一份最后通牒。

original: In an angry meeting with [GER.GetLeader], our ambassador was confronted with a stern refusal to discuss or negotiate on anything concerning [CZE.GetNameDef]. The German government considers that country to be entirely in their sphere of influence and has warned that any interference would be considered to go against the express wishes of [GER.GetLeader].
translation: 在和[GER.GetLeader]的一场愤怒的会面中，我们的大使收到了严厉的拒绝，他们坚决不愿谈论和协商任何与[CZE.GetNameDef]有关的问题。德国政府认为该国完全已经在他们的势力范围之中并警告任何对该国的干涉都将被视为对抗[GER.GetLeader]意志的行为。
是时候重新考虑我们的进路

original: With German troops massing on our borders, the Ambassadors from Germany and Romania have issued a joint ultimatum: Unless we agree to turn over Slovakia to Hungary and Romania and become a 'Protectorate' of Germany, the German Luftwaffe stands ready to 'erradicate' Prague while Hungarian troops are preparing to invade our country from the south.
translation: 随着德国部队在我们边境集结，德国和罗马尼亚的大使已经提交了一份联合最后通牒：除非我们同意将斯洛伐克归还给罗马尼亚和匈牙利并成为德国的一个“保护国”，否则德国空军就准备“抹去”布拉格而匈牙利军队将于南面入侵我们的国家。

original: We will chose Death before Dishonor.
translation: 在耻辱面前我们宁可选择死亡

original: The [CZE.GetAdjective] government has ignored our ultimatum and mobilized their army. [CZE.GetLeader] has promised that any invader would find the army more than prepared to defend the country to the last man.
translation: [CZE.GetAdjective]政府已经忽略了我们的最后通牒并开始动员部队。[CZE.GetLeader]已经宣言任何入侵者都会发现他们的军队早已枕戈待旦，准备为保卫这个国家战至最后一人。
我们将会考虑我们的选择

original: Several foreign truck companies have expressed interest in opening a factory in Romania, to produce new trucks for the commercial market as well as the military. Chosing one will be considered a flagship deal that could be followed by further production licenses being acquired.\n\nWho should we approach?
translation: 好几个外国机动车公司都已经表示了在罗马尼亚开设工厂的兴趣，来生产新型卡车以投入商业市场和军事用途。在其中选择一个将是我们最为重大的交易，决定我们未来所能取得的生产许可。\n\n我们应该联络谁？
沃克斯豪尔，出于获取更快速的载具
欧宝，出于可靠性高的德国工艺
福特，出于大量生产的目的

original:
Following our decision to sign a pact with Germany, a group of Air Force officers has launched a coup. The military has seized key points in Belgrade. King Peter has been declared of age, ending the regency of [YUG.GetLeader].

The general population has been supportive of the coup, with crowds chanting "Better the war than the pact, better the grave than a slave!"

The government is at a crossroads. We can support the coup, which will mean war with Germany. Or we can try to fight against it, which will tear the country apart in a bloody civil war.
translation:
由于我们决定与德国签署协议，一部分空军军官发动了一场政变。其下军队控制了贝尔格莱德的要地。宣称彼得国王已到执政之年并结束[YUG.GetLeader]的摄政。

人民大众对于政变者基本处于支持中，而群众则高呼“宁愿开战反条约，宁可入土不做奴！”

现今政府正需抉择，我们可以支持政变者——尽管这意味着与德国开战。亦或是打压叛乱——而我国将陷入四分五裂的血腥内战。

original: We should have listened to the officers.
translation: 我们早就该听听军官们的意见了。

original: Immediately after the government of Prince Paul signed the Tripartite Pact, a group of [YUG.GetAdjective] Air Force officers executed a well-planned coup that replaced the legitimate government and put the underage Peter II on the throne.\n\nThe Yugoslavian government has folded entirely, with the new leaders declaring Prince Paul's signature null and void.
translation: 紧接在保罗亲王签署三方协议之后，一群[YUG.GetAdjective]空军军官发动了一场精密策划的政变以替换掉现有合法政府并让彼得二世登上王位。\n\n前南斯拉夫政府已然全面让步，其新领导人宣称保罗亲王所签署之条约既不合法也无效力。

original: Immediately after the government of Prince Paul signed the Tripartite Pact, a group of [YUG.GetAdjective] Air Force officers executed a well-planned coup that replaced the legitimate government and put the underage Peter II on the throne.\n\nElements of the former government have denounced the coup and declared a national emergency. Since this is clearly the work of foreign agents, they claim that we are obligated to defend them.
translation: 紧接在保罗亲王签署三方协议后，一群[YUG.GetAdjective]空军军官发动了一场精密策划的政变以替换掉现有合法政府并让彼得二世登上王位。\n\n前政府成员谴责该政变的行为并宣布全国进入紧急戒严状态。显而易见，这是外国间谍干的好事；他们称我国责任为其提供防护。

original: As news of the declaration of war against Germany spread around the country, it quickly became clear that many people in the country have no intention of taking up arms against the invaders. Majority Croatian units have refused orders to move towards the border, and in several occasions have even opened fire on other units that were following orders.\n\nIt appears that we can no longer rely on the Croatians to support us, which has made defense of the border with Germany difficult to say the least.
translation: 在向德国宣战的消息传遍我国之后，显然国内许多人根本没有拿起武器抵抗入侵者的意愿。主由克罗地亚人组成的军事单位拒绝执行前往国境的命令，甚至还有些向正在执行命令的其他单位开火的事例。\n\n很明显，克罗地亚人是靠不住的，至少与德国交壤地区的防卫无法稳定了。

original: Realizing a strategic weakness, the [YUG.GetAdjective] Air Force has initiated a crash program to modernize and expand its force. Significant money reserves have been set aside to cover the purchase. A commission is traveling around Europe to look for new sources of fighters and medium bombers.\n\nGiven the urgency of the issue, the [YUG.GetAdjective]s have insisted on immediate delivery or transfer of planes directly from the producer.
translation: 意识到战略层级上的弱点，[YUG.GetAdjective]空军已发起一系列迅速的空军现代化及拓展项目。数目可观的预算已为这些支出做好了准备。一个使团正巡回欧洲，寻求着战斗机及中型轰炸机的新提供商。\n\n基于该问题急切需要解决，[YUG.GetAdjective]使团坚持从生产商手中直接运输或交付购入的飞机。

original: Approve the sale of fighters from our reserves.
translation: 批准从我国库存中购入战斗机。

original: Approve the sale of bombers from our reserves.
translation: 批准从我国库存中购入轰炸机。

original: Divert fighter production to cover their order.
translation: 转用战斗机生产线以完成订单。

original: Divert bomber production to cover their order.
translation: 转用轰炸机生产线以完成订单。
我们提供不了任何东西

original: Our purchasing commission in [From.GetNameDef] has secured the sale of a number of fighter planes for our air force. The first planes have already been received, and our pilots have begun conversion training.
translation: 我国在[From.GetNameDef]的交易使团已为我国空军确保了一定数量的战斗机。首批飞机已然送达，而我国飞行员正开展机种转换训练。

original: Our purchasing commission in [From.GetNameDef] has secured the sale of a number of medium bombers for our air force. The first planes have already been received, and our pilots have begun conversation training.
translation: 我国在[From.GetNameDef]的交易使团已为我国空军确保了一定数量的中型轰炸机。首批飞机已然送达，而我国飞行员正开展机种转换训练。

original: \nFollowing the return of Austria to the Reich, we now share a border with [YUG.GetNameDef]. The government of [YUG.GetLeader] has been fairly quiet about their stance on our proposed reordering of Europe. Perhaps we should remind them that the time will come when they must make a choice.
translation: \n在奥地利回归帝国后，我们现今与[YUG.GetNameDef]边境接壤。而[YUG.GetLeader]所领导的该国政府在关于我国所提出的欧洲重整计划和该国立场上出奇地安静。也许我们该提醒他们一下需要作出抉择的时刻总会来的。
他们的看法根本不重要。

original: A few days ago, the German ambassador cornered [YUG.GetLeader] at a diplomatic reception. Following the Anschluss of Austria, he noted, [YUG.GetNameDef] and [GER.GetNameDef] now share a common border. The ambassador assured [YUG.GetLeader] that Germany was, of course, very interested in friendly relations. \n\nHe only requested that we kept that in mind when making policy decisions in the future.
translation: 几天前，德国大使在一场招待会上拦住了[YUG.GetLeader]。他指出在德奥合并之后，[YUG.GetNameDef]和[GER.GetNameDef]现已接壤。德国大使向[YUG.GetLeader]表示，德国在发展友好关系方面很有兴趣。\n\n他仅要求我们在对未来政策的权衡上留点心。
看看他，多么友好的一个人。

original: With [CZE.GetNameDef] out of the picture, the balance of power in south-eastern Europe has shifted dramatically. Czech arms and money were used to support a number of countries that now need to look for new sponsors. Perhaps it is time to remind [YUG.GetLeader] of that fact.
translation: 在[CZE.GetNameDef]退出历史舞台后，欧洲东南部的政治局势发生了重大变动。以往接受捷克的武装和资金支援的国家现在需要新的赞助商。也许是时候提醒一下[YUG.GetLeader]这件事了。

original:
Mere hours after German troops entered Prague, while the [CZE.GetAdjective] ambassador was still saying his farewells, the ambassador of [GER.GetNameDef] called at the Foreign Office. 

According to him, the German government deeply regrets that it had to take such measures in [CZE.GetNameDef], and [GER.GetLeader] is glad that the actions of [YUG.GetLeader] have not given him cause to consider such actions in regards to Yugoslavia.

The ambassador finished by expressing his hope that this would remain so in the future.
translation:
仅在德军士兵进入布拉格的几个小时后，在[CZE.GetAdjective]大使仍在进行道别时，[GER.GetNameDef]大使致电了外务处。

据她所说，德国政府对不得不这样处理[CZE.GetNameDef]表示很后悔，而[GER.GetLeader]很高兴看到[YUG.GetLeader]未采取会让他考虑以同样方式应对南斯拉夫的行为。

德国大使表示他希望未来也会是这样并结束了通话。

original: We now stand supreme in Europe. France was long the foundation of stability in south-eastern Europe, but now the entire area is up for grabs. We can pull all the nations there in our orbit, with no one left to stop us. \n\nIt's time to tell the Yugoslavians that they have to make a choice. Either they stand with us - or they will be swept away.
translation: 我国现今在欧洲处于至高的地位。长久以来，法国一直是欧洲东南部局势稳定的根基，但现今该地之境皆唾手可得。我们可以将周边全部国家拉入阵营而后便无人能够阻挡我国大势。\n\n是时候让南斯拉夫人做出选择了。要么与我们站在一边——要么准备受死吧。

original: Our patience with them is running thin.
translation: 我们的耐心快到极限了。

original: The Tiger cares not for the opinions of mice.
translation: 我大德意志雄虎怎会在意区区鼠辈之见。

original: In a recent meeting at the Berghof, [GER.GetLeader] and [YUG.GetLeader] discussed the situation in Europe, and our role in it. [GER.GetLeader] insists that Yugoslavia can not avoid taking a side in the life-or-death struggle looming in the distance. Nor could Germany tolerate an unaligned country at her borders. \n\nIt would almost be preferable, he ended, if Yugoslavia choose to side with the Allies, just so everyone knew where they stood.
translation: 近日在伯格霍夫的一次会议中，[GER.GetLeader]和[YUG.GetLeader]谈及了现今欧洲局势以及我国在其中的处境。[GER.GetLeader]表明南斯拉夫不可能在逐渐逼近的生死抉择中不选好要站的队伍。而德国则无法容忍一个非其盟国的邻居。\n\n他表示如果南斯拉夫选择和同盟国在一边倒也不差，至少大家都知道自己站在哪边了。

original: After pressing them time and time again to declare for one side, the government of [YUG.GetLeader] still clings to the idea that Yugoslavia can sit out this conflict on the side lines. Now they must face the consequences of their cowardice.
translation: 在对其阵营选择的屡次施压后，[YUG.GetLeader]领导下的南斯拉夫政府仍觉得他们能不参与这场冲突而靠边站。现在他们要面对自己优柔寡断而懦弱所导致的后果了。

original: If they are not with us, they are against us!
translation: 要么加入我们，要么与我们为敌！

original: They are, and will forever remain, irrelevant.
translation: 他们一直，也永远会是无关紧要的。

original: Yugoslavia forms the lynchpin of our new Balkan strategy. They have so far remained non-commital, trading with Germany but stopping well short of joining the Axis. We should remind them that we would not tolerate trading with the enemy in case war breaks out.
translation: 南斯拉夫在我们的新巴尔干战略中是一个重要角色。迄今为止，他们的状况及与德国的交易不置可否；但一切都会在其加入轴心国后立刻转变。应该提醒他们一下，假设战争爆发，我们是不会容忍与敌国进行交易的。

original: We can't interfere in the affairs of another nation.
translation: 我们不能干预他国内政。

original: [ENG.GetLeader] recently announced a diplomatic offensive in the Balkan region. Part of that advance was a private meeting between him and our ambassador in London. During this meeting, he inquired about our position with regards to Germany. [GER.GetNameDefCap], he noted, accounted for a significant amount of our non-resource exports. We would do well, he continued, to reduce our dependence on Germany.
translation: [ENG.GetLeader]近期宣布了一项在巴尔干地区的外交进程。其项目的一部分即为他本人在伦敦与我国大使进行私人访谈。会面途中，他询问了我国对德政策的立场。他指出，[GER.GetNameDefCap]购入了数量可观的非资源类出口品。他表示，如果我们减少对德国的依赖也能过得很好。

original:
The Treaty of Munich might mean peace in our time - or it may not. Germany is hardly the only country seeking to redraw the borders of Europe. The government of [YUG.GetLeader] has so far been surprisingly mum about the fate of their main armament supplier.

This has made quite a few people in the diplomatic service wonder if the Yugoslavians knew what was going to happen, and may in fact have agreed to it. 

We should consider reminding them that any sort of agreement with Germany will be considered a hostile act if war were to break out.
translation:
慕尼黑协定代表着我们这一代人的和平——也许不是。德国并非唯一一个试图重新规划欧洲各国边境的国家。令人惊讶的是，[YUG.GetLeader]领导下的政府对其前主要装备供应商的命运毫无反响。

这使得不少外务人员质疑南斯拉夫人究竟知不知道将来会发生什么，且他们很有可能就这么接受一切。

我们应该考虑提醒一下他们假设战争爆发，任何与德国的协定将会被视为敌对行为。

original: They must still be in shock.
translation: 可能他们还没反应过来。

original: A Special Representative has arrived from Britain, here to discuss our opinion on the Treaty of Munich. It appears that [ENG.GetLeader] had hoped for a more firm declaration of support from us during the war scare that accompanied the negotiations. The fate of [CZE.GetNameDef], he reminded us, is tied to our own. Should [CZE.GetNameDef] fall to the Germans, we would find ourselves increasingly isolated on the continent.
translation: 一位从英国来的特别代表已抵达我国来查明我国对慕尼黑协定的看法。看来由于伴随着当时谈判而来的战争威胁，[ENG.GetLeader]希望我们做出更实际的声明以表支持其立场。他指出，[CZE.GetNameDef]的命运与我国未来紧紧相连。如果[CZE.GetNameDef]落入日耳曼人手中，我们在大陆上的局势将更为孤立。

original: They are just looking for new pawns.

Despite the war raging for several months now, [YUG.GetLeader] still refuses to declare for one side, even continuing to trade with Germany while observing strict neutrality. While their support for Germany is probably not immediately critical, we must decide if we want to allow them to support a country we are actively at war with.
translation: 尽管战火已然熊熊燃烧了数月，[YUG.GetLeader]仍不愿明确表达己方立场，甚至在严谨中立政策的掩护下继续和德国交易。尽管他们对德国的支援还并不是很关键，我们必须决定要不要允许他们继续支持一个证与我国处于战争中的国家。
他们保持中立对我国更有利。

original: The British ambassador visited the Foreign Office today, demanding to know why we still traded with Germany. The British government, we were told, considered this to be a hostile act, and would consider 'appropriate measures' unless we stopped at once.
translation: 英国大使今天访问了外务部并要求澄清我国是否还在和德国交易。他声称英国政府视其为敌对行为，如果我们不立刻中止，则会考虑进行‘妥善处理’。

original: It appears that our pressure on Yugoslavia has not had the intended effect. Rather than ceasing trade with Germany or declaring their support for the allied cause, The government of [YUG.GetLeader] clings to its neutrality and refuses to budge. Lately, MI6 has received reports that the Yugoslavian government considers granting Germany the right to freely move troops through their country.
translation: 看来我们对南斯拉夫的施压没达到预期效果。比起中止与德国的交易或宣称对同盟国事业的支持，[YUG.GetLeader]领导下的政府仍保持其中立并拒绝让步。而后，军情六处收到报告称南斯拉夫政府正考虑向德国发布军事通行权。

original: They might as well be an enemy already.
translation: 他们可能已经是我们的敌人了。

original: We shouldn't make more enemies now.
translation: 我们现在不该树立太多敌人。

original: Our relations with the Czechs have been spotty in the past, but recently their politics have taken a sharp turn towards the right side of history. Combined with increasing pressure from Germany and a lack of faith in the ability of the Western democracies to protect them has resulted in a formal request to join the Comintern.
translation: 我们和捷克的关系从过去开始一直很复杂，然而近来他们的政治方向已经专向了右方，面临着德国的军事压力和西方民主国家保护的不信任，他们现在正式要求加入共产国际
他们对此还没有准备好

original: [SOV.GetLeader] has accepted our request to join the Comintern. Our delegation has joined the Executive Committee with full voting rights.
translation: [SOV.GetLeader] 已经接受了我们加入共产国际的要求，我国的代表团已经加入了共产国际的执行委员会并有着完全的投票权

original: [SOV.GetLeader] has refused our request to join the Comintern, without giving any reason.
translation: [SOV.GetLeader]拒绝了我们加入共产国际的要求，并没有给出任何理由

original: So much for our Slavic ties...
translation: 我们与斯拉夫人的关系就是这样……

original: Relations with Romania have always been strained by their occupation of our rightful territory of Bessarabia, but as if that was not enough the entire nation impedes our ability to come to the aid of our [From.GetNameAdj] allies. Those same allies have now proposed a solution: Partition Romania between us to solve this problem once and for all!
translation: 我们和罗马尼亚的关系一直以来都因为他们占领了我们的合法领土比萨拉比亚而变得紧张，然而现在这一边界纠纷因为他们拒绝让我们帮助我们的盟友[From.GetNameAdj] 而进一步升级。然而我们的盟友提出了一个绝妙的解决方案：拆分罗马尼亚！一劳永逸的解决我们两国的问题！
我们将迎接一场简单轻松的胜利
我们会找到别的解决方法的

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has approved our solution to the Romania problem. The military is ready, and the campaign can begin at our discretion.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经批准了我们对罗马尼亚问题的解决方案。 军方已经准备好了，随时可以开始行动

original: [From.GetLeader] has turned down our proposition concerning the Romania problem. It appears that he still has plans for Romania.
translation: [From.GetLeader] 拒绝了我们关于罗马尼亚问题的解决方案。似乎他对于罗马尼亚还有别的计划

original: From the very beginning of our quest to liberate the workers of the world, Poland has been nothing but trouble. Now our [From.GetNameAdj] allies have made an interesting proposition: Poland has taken land from both of our nations, so why not repay the favor and divide Poland between us?
translation: 从我们追求解放世界工人的伟大理想的那一刻开始，波兰一直我们的大麻烦。 现在我们的盟友[From.GetNameAdj]提出了一个有趣的方案：波兰已经从我们两国的土地上掠夺了足够土地，那么为什么我们不去要求波兰偿还这一切并为此付出代价呢？
为什么不，我们同意对波兰发起行动

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has approved our proposed solution to the Polish Situation. We will begin operations as soon as the order is given.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经同意我们一起去解决波兰的局势了，我们的军队一旦受到命令便会开始行动

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has not approved our proposal. We must bide our time and consider other options.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]并没有同意我们的建议，我们必须抓紧时间并考虑其他选择

original: Since the end of the Great War, Poland has occupied German land. As if that wasn't enough, they have constantly attacked their neighbors to aggressively expand their territory. Our [From.GetNameAdj] allies have come to the same conclusion as us: To ensure the peace in Europe, the Polish state must be eliminated.
translation: 自从上一次大战结束以来，波兰就占领了大部分属于德国的合法土地以重新建国，然而这对他们来说却远远不够，他们不断地进攻他们的领国来扩张他们的领土。我们的 [From.GetNameAdj] 盟友已经得出了和我们一样的结论，为了确保欧洲的和平，波兰必须再一次的从地图上抹去

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has approved our plan to deal with the Polish Situation. We can strike as soon as preparations are completed.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经同意了我们处理波兰的计划，一旦我们的部队准备就绪，对波兰的突袭就将开始

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has rejected our solution to the Polish Situation. Time will tell if another opportunity arises.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了我们解决波兰的计划，也许时间会给我们另一次的机会

original: Ever since we removed them from the government, the Slovak Leaders have been burning with resentment and inciting the population to violence. Today, their words have finally succeeded in bringing about the war they so desperately wanted. The Slovak Rebellion has begun.
translation: 自从我们把斯洛伐克人从政府中剔除之后，那些斯洛伐克官员就一直在怨恨着我们，在斯洛伐克人力煽动暴力与冲突的思想。今天他们的行为终于成功了，他们得到了他们想要的战争。斯洛伐克叛乱开始了

original: If they want war, then they shall have it.
translation: 如果他们想要战争，那么就给他们吧

original: The last bastions of Slovak power have been crushed. The rebellion is at an end.
translation: 斯洛伐克叛乱分子的最后一个堡垒已被我们压制，叛乱结束了

original: Despite initial misgivings, the Czechs have come to consider Bolshevism as the imminent threat it really is, and are now requesting to join the Axis powers. The government of [CZE.GetLeader] has specifically stated that this does not impact the question of the Sudetenland in any way.
translation: 尽管一开始双方都疑虑重重，但现在捷克人已经认识到布尔什维克才是真正的迫在眉睫的威胁，他们现在要求加入轴心国。 [CZE.GetLeader] 的政府具体指出，这并不影响处理苏台德区的问题

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has accepted our request to join the Axis!
[From.GetNameDefCap] has refused our request to join the Axis!
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]拒绝了我们加入轴心国的请求

original: The government of [From.GetLeader] has realized what we have known all along: [From.GetNameDef] can only continue to exist under our protection. Although this precludes the possibility of directly occupying their land, it might be better to have a willing ally, and avoids any meddling by foreign actors.
translation: [From.GetLeader] 和他的政府已经认识到一个事实： [From.GetNameDef]只能在我们的保护下继续存在，虽然这样我们就不可能直接占领他们的土地，但这样却能收获一个忠心的盟友，且避免了外国势力的任何干扰

original: [From.GetLeader] has accepted our offer. A [From.GetAdjective] plentipotary has arrived in Prague to coordinate policies.
translation: [From.GetLeader]已经同意了我们的请求。[From.GetAdjective]全权大使已经到达布拉格商讨相关政策。

original: When presented with our proposal, [From.GetLeader] reportedly exclaimed "Not in a Thousand Years!", before launching into a lengthy tirade about the inferiority of our people, our system of government, and the leadership qualities of [CZE.GetLeader]. No official refusal has been submitted, but our ambassador holds little hope.
translation: 据说在收到我们的提议之后[From.GetLeader]领导人大呼“死都没门”，然后就开始了关于我国人民如何低贱、我国政府如何落后以及[CZE.GetLeader]领导人如何糟糕的长篇大论。虽然现在还没有收到正式拒绝，我国大使表示对他们的接受不抱希望。

original: Perhaps it is for the best.
translation: 说不定这才是最好的结果。

original: The government of [From.GetNameDef] has offered up the Sudetenland as a step towards coming to a mutual understanding. On one hand, this is a great opportunity to acquire a rich state for little cost and with little danger. On the other hand, creating a crisis over the Sudetenland would be an excellent opportunity to show the world that the so-called Great Powers holding up the Treaty of Versailles are toothless and morally inferior.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]政府已经为了解决苏台德问题迈出了第一步。苏台德问题一方面是一个很好的机会，让我们能以极小的成本和几乎没有的风险就能得到一个富裕的国家。另一方面，在苏台德发生的危机将会向全世界羞辱凡尔赛合约，并让人们明白这一合约是毫无约束力且违背道德的

original: [From.GetNameDefCap] has accepted our offer. [From.GetAdjective] troops have moved into the Sudetenland to the cheers of the local population.
translation: [From.GetNameDefCap]已经同意了我们的要求。[From.GetAdjective]的部队在当地人的欢呼下进驻苏台德

original: They can ask no more, surely.
translation: 他们不会再要更多了，相信我

original: [From.GetLeader] has refused our offer to hand over the Sudetenland. He did not give any reason for this move, but the [From.GetAdjective] decision has sent a shockwave through the military, who believes the Germans might have bigger plans for us.
translation: [From.GetLeader]拒绝向交出苏台德。因为他没有任何理由去交出自己国家的土地，但[From.GetAdjective]的决定已经让军方感到震惊，他们认为德国人将会对我们有一个更大的计划

original: The government of [From.GetNameDef] has decided to reaffirm the 'Little Entente' alliance, which had lapsed in recent years in the face of growing German influence. Their foreign minister was recently in our capital to discuss whether we would be interested in joining the alliance as a permanent member.
translation: [From.GetNameDef]政府已经决定重新组建小协约国联盟以抑制近年来不断扩大影响力的德国。他们的外交部长近日邀请了我们的大使前往首都讨论是否有兴趣再一次的加入联盟并作为小协约国的常任理事国

original: [From.GetName] has agreed to join the Entente. A military delegation has arrived to discuss defensive arrangements.
translation: [From.GetName]已经同意了加入小协约国，一个军事代表团到达了我们的首都，就共同防御事宜展开商讨

original: While [From.GetLeader] agreed to meet our delegation, he has so far refused to commit his country to join the Entente. The [From.GetAdjective]s seem to be worried that joining our alliance might destabilize the careful balance of power in the region.
translation: 虽然来自[From.GetLeader]的大使同意了与我们进行会面，但他迄今依然拒绝让他的国家重新回到小协约国来。看上去[From.GetAdjective]在担心我们的联盟将会破坏该地区的地缘政治平衡

original: The Entente lead by [From.GetNameDef] has long been aimed at containing our nation. However, as German power grows, [From.GetNameDef] feels increasingly threatened from that direction. unwilling to face a threat on two sides, [From.GetLeader] now seeks to come to an understanding with us. \n\nOur government is split on the issue. One faction believes that an agreement with [From.GetNameDef] is the first step to breaking the encirclement, while the other faction points to the fact that this would no doubt draw the wrath of [GER.GetLeader].
translation: [From.GetNameDef]领导的小协约国长期以来遏制着我们国家，然而近来随着德国力量不断地增长，[From.GetNameDef]开始感到腹背受敌，并希望从双方威胁里下挣脱出来。因此[From.GetLeader]现在希望与我们达成和解\n\n我们的政府在这个问题上出现了分裂，一派认为与[From.GetNameDef]的和解将是打破包围圈以及两国交往正常化的第一步，而另一派则指出这毫无疑问会引起[GER.GetLeader]并可能招来报复

original: [From.GetLeader] was surprisingly open to our offer. We have signed a Treaty of Mutual Friendship, affirming that neither of us has any territorial claims on the other.
translation: 令人惊讶的是，[From.GetLeader]同意了我们的协议。随后我们签署了“互相友好条约”，确保我们两国互相之间都没有任何领土要求

original: Surprising few, [From.GetLeader] has rejected our offer, citing our unwillingness to surrender certain territories to Hungary.
translation: 令人惊讶的是， [From.GetLeader]拒绝了我们的提议，并指责我们不愿把某些地区交给匈牙利

original: [From.GetName] has today announced that the almost-defunct 'Little Entente' alliance system will stand by their commitments. A statement released by the [From.GetNameAdj] Foreign office announced:\n'[From.GetName] is not a Great Power, but it is a Regional Power. It is our firm belief that an alliance of Regional Powers can and will prevent the so-called Great Powers from meddling in our affairs.
translation: [From.GetName]在今天宣布，几乎已经崩溃的小协约国联盟从今天开始将持续恢复旧日的效能。一份来自[From.GetNameAdj] 的外交声明称：\n'[From.GetName]并不是一个强权国家，而只是一个区域性的力量，但我们坚信，像我们这样的有着区域性力量的国家的联盟将会团结在一起阻止所谓的大国干预我们的政治事物

original: Together we are a Great Power.
translation: 联合在一起，我们便是强权

original: We haven't forgotten who it was meant against.
translation: 我们可没有忘记这个同盟原本是为了对付谁的。

original: We'll make short work of them regardless, if we must.
translation: 不论如何我们都会以最快的速度解决他们，如果必要。

original: We will fight alongside our new allies to the bitter end.
translation: 我们将与我们的新盟友一起面对战斗

original: They have made a wise choice.
translation: 他们做出了明智的选择。

original: Shocking much of Europe, [CZE.GetName] has signed a treaty of Alliance with [GER.GetNameDef]. [CZE.GetName], formally strongly Democratic, has been drifting further and further towards the Right in recent months.
translation: 令整个欧洲震惊的是，[CZE.GetName] 与[GER.GetNameDef]签署了一份结盟条约。此前就有报告表示[CZE.GetName]的民主党派，近几个月来思想上一直在走向右派

original: Shocking much of Europe, [CZE.GetName] has signed a treaty of Alliance with [SOV.GetNameDef]. [CZE.GetName], formally strongly Democratic, has been drifting further and further towards the Left in recent months.
translation: 令整个欧洲震惊的是，[CZE.GetName]与[SOV.GetNameDef]签署了一份结盟条约，此前就有报告表示[CZE.GetName]的民主党派近几个月来思想上一直在走向左派

original: In a move that has surprized many, [CZE.GetName] today unilaterally surrendered the Sudetenland region to Germany. When questioned, a source in the [CZE.GetName] Foreign office replied that 'It was obvious which way the wind was blowing, this was the only path to national survival.' \n\nAn unnamed French minister reportedly condemned the [CZE.GetNameAdj] move, claiming the West would have supported [CZE.GetName] had Germany pressured them.
translation: 令人惊讶的消息，[CZE.GetName]今天单方面将苏台德地区拱手交给德国。当被问及原因时， [CZE.GetName] 外交部的发言人回答道：风的方向是很容易就被感觉到的，这也是国家生存的唯一途径。\n\n此外有一位法国的部长匿名谴责[CZE.GetNameAdj]的行为，声称西方国家在[CZE.GetName]面对德国的压力时毫无作为

original: Through their foresight they prevented a crisis.
translation: 通过他们的远见，他们阻止了危机的爆发
他们做出了明智的选择

original:
An exceptionally inebriated and emotional King Carol II hijacked today's strategy meeting, calling everyone's attention to a 'brilliant' idea he came up with the previous night.

Truly a romantic at heart, the King declared with tears in his eyes that he wished for the women in his life to know the intense and true love he feels for them. Addressing the Chiefs of Staff and the Cabinet with a lengthy, albeit rather slurred monologue, he appealed to their most delicate and heart-felt sensibilities, only to finish by solemnly calling for the renaming of two of the enemy's great cities as a tribute to that greatest and deepest of feelings known to man; love.

The King has clearly become entirely fixated upon this idea in his mind, and he is highly unlikely to budge easily should we wish to dissuade him.
translation:
异常执着于感情的国王卡罗尔二世挤占了今天的战略会议，要求每个人集中注意听他昨晚想到的一个“天才般”的主意。

国王真是有一颗浪漫的心，他伴随着眼中的泪光宣称他希望他生命中的每个女人都能感受到和他对她们所抱有的炽热爱意一样的感情。在对参谋长和内阁说了一串长长的但相当含混不清的独白后，他向诸位最为微妙和内心最深处的情感展开呼吁，仅仅是为了真诚地要求将敌方的两个大城市重新命名以纪念人类最为伟大和最为深沉的感情：爱。

国王显然已经全身心投入到这个想法中，因此不大可能被劝阻。我们是否应该劝劝他？

original: He's truly a genius descended from the heavens!
translation: 他真是一个从天而降的天才！

original: Throw a party to distract him, instead. A -really- big one.
translation: 开一个派对来使他分心。一个非常非常大的派对。
